trans-unit.source: Represents a document in Word projects created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Word 项目中的一个文档，这些项目通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object provides the same members as a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object from the Word primary interop assembly, but it adds the following features:
trans-unit.target: A<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>对象提供相同的成员<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>从 Word 主互操作程序集，但它的对象将添加以下功能：

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Controls%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to add managed controls to a Word document, or remove controls, at run time.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性将托管的控件添加到 Word 文档，或删除控件，在运行时。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.VstoSmartTags%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.VstoSmartTags%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to add smart tags to a document.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于向文档添加智能标记。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.InnerObject%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.InnerObject%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to get the underlying <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object for a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来获取基础<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Document-level events, such as <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.BeforeClose> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.BeforeSave>, that are provided only at the application level in the Word object model.
trans-unit.target: 文档级事件，如<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.BeforeClose>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.BeforeSave>，仅在 Word 对象模型中的应用程序级别提供。

trans-unit.source: That is, in the Word object model, these events are available on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application?displayProperty=fullName> object rather than a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，在 Word 对象模型中，这些事件都位于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application?displayProperty=fullName>对象而不是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>对象。

trans-unit.source: In an application-level project, you can create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object by using the `GetVstoObject` method.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序级项目中，你可以创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>对象使用`GetVstoObject`方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Word 文档和 Excel VSTO 外接程序在运行时中的工作簿](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: In a document-level project, you typically do not use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> objects directly.
trans-unit.target: 在文档级项目中，通常不使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>直接对象。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the `ThisDocument` class to programmatically access the document in your project.
trans-unit.target: 请改用`ThisDocument`类以编程方式访问你的项目中的文档。

trans-unit.source: The `ThisDocument` class derives most of its members from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: `ThisDocument`类派生其大多数成员从<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase?displayProperty=fullName>类。

trans-unit.source: This class redirects all calls to its members to an internal implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> interface in the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此类将对其成员的所有调用重都定向到的内部实现<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>接口中[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Accepts all tracked changes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 接受文档中的所有修订。

trans-unit.source: Accepts all revisions in the document that are displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 接受文档中所有显示在屏幕上的修订。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.RejectAllRevisionsShown%2A> method to reject all revisions in the document that are displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.RejectAllRevisionsShown%2A>方法以拒绝文档中所有屏幕显示的修订。

trans-unit.source: Gives focus to the document.
trans-unit.target: 向文档提供焦点。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the document becomes the active window.
trans-unit.target: 在文档变成活动窗口时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActivateEvent> event occurs only when you move the focus within an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActivateEvent>仅当你将焦点移动应用程序中发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: Moving the focus to or from an object in another application does not trigger the event.
trans-unit.target: 将焦点移到或从另一个应用程序中的对象不会触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code snippet displays a message when the document is activated.
trans-unit.target: 激活该文档时，下面的代码段将显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: This example is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the active theme plus the theme formatting options for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的活动主题名称以及主题格式设置选项。

trans-unit.source: The name of the active theme plus the theme formatting options for the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档的活动主题名称以及主题格式设置选项。

trans-unit.source: This property returns "none" if the document does not have an active theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档没有活动的主题，此属性将返回"none"。

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the value returned by this property, see the `Name` argument of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ApplyTheme%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 返回此属性的值的说明，请参阅`Name`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ApplyTheme%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by this property might not correspond to the theme's display name.
trans-unit.target: 返回此属性的值可能与主题的显示名称不对应。

trans-unit.source: To return a theme's display name, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActiveThemeDisplayName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要返回主题的显示名称，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActiveThemeDisplayName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the display name of the active theme for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的活动主题的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the active theme for the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档的活动主题的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: This property returns "none" if the document does not have an active theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档没有活动的主题，此属性将返回"none"。

trans-unit.source: A theme's display name is the name that appears in the **Theme** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 主题的显示名称是出现在名称**主题**对话框。

trans-unit.source: This name might not correspond to the string you would use to set a default theme or to apply a theme to a document.
trans-unit.target: 此名称可能不对应于你用来设置默认主题，或将主题应用于文档的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Window" /> that represents the active window.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示活动窗口的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Window" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Window" /> that represents the active window.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示活动窗口的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Window" />。

trans-unit.source: The active window is the window that currently has focus.
trans-unit.target: 活动窗口是当前具有焦点的窗口。

trans-unit.source: If there are no windows open, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有打开的窗口，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets the writing style for a specified language in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档中指定语言的编写样式。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the writing style for a specified language in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个为文档中的指定语言指定编写样式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActiveWritingStyle%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActiveWritingStyle%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID> values that specifies the language to set the writing style for in the specified document.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLanguageID>指定要在指定的文档中设置的书写样式的语言的值。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActiveWritingStyle%2A> property without specifying a parameter, it returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document_ActiveWritingStyleType> object that is is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ActiveWritingStyle%2A>未指定参数的属性，它返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document_ActiveWritingStyleType>对象，它不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: To get a list of the available writing styles, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Language.WritingStyleList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取可用的书写样式的列表，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Language.WritingStyleList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the writing style of the text in the current selection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示文本的书写样式中当前选择。

trans-unit.source: This example is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Creates a shortcut to the document and adds it to the **Favorites** folder.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个文档快捷方式并将其添加到“收藏夹”文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" /> that represents the creator of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示文档创建者的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" /> that represents the creator of the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示文档创建者的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" />。

trans-unit.source: The full path of the theme to apply.
trans-unit.target: 要应用的主题的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Applies a document theme to a document.
trans-unit.target: 将文档主题应用于文档。

trans-unit.source: The name of the style set to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的样式集的名称。

trans-unit.source: Can be either a string that specifies the name of the set to use (the string corresponds to the names listed in the **Style Set** list) or one of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdApplyQuickStyleSets" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 可以是指定要使用的样式集名称的字符串（该字符串对应于“样式集”列表中列出的名称），也可以是 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdApplyQuickStyleSets" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified quick style set to the document.
trans-unit.target: 对文档应用指定的快速样式集。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is used in a Word 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the theme plus any theme formatting options you want to apply.
trans-unit.target: 要应用的主题名称加上任何主题格式选项。

trans-unit.source: Applies a theme to a document, if the document is open.
trans-unit.target: 将主题应用到此文档（如果文档已打开）。

trans-unit.source: The format of the `Name` string is "theme nnn" where theme and nnn are defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 格式`Name`字符串是"主题 nnn"其中主题和 nnn 定义的如下所示：

trans-unit.source: theme – The name of the folder that contains the data for the requested theme.
trans-unit.target: 主题 – 包含请求的主题的数据的文件夹的名称。

trans-unit.source: (The default location for theme data folders is C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Themes11.) You must use the folder name for the theme rather than the display name that appears in the **Theme** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: （主题数据文件夹的默认位置是 C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Themes11。）你必须使用为该主题的文件夹名称而不是显示中的显示名称**主题**对话框。

trans-unit.source: nnn – A three-digit string that indicates which theme formatting options to activate (1 to activate, 0 to deactivate).
trans-unit.target: nnn – 指示格式设置选项以激活 (若要激活，0，若要停用的 1) 的主题的三个数字字符串。

trans-unit.source: The digits correspond to the **Vivid** **Colors**, **Active** **Graphics**, and **Background** **Image** check boxes in the **Theme** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 每个数字对应于**鲜艳****颜色**， **Active** **图形**，和**后台** **映像**中的复选框**主题**对话框。

trans-unit.source: If this string is omitted, the default value for nnn is "011" (Active Graphics and Background Image are activated).
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此字符串，nnn 的默认值是"011"（活动图形和背景图像都被激活）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Template" /> that represents the template attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个表示附加到文档的模板的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Template" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Template" /> that represents the template attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示附加到文档的模板的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Template" />。

trans-unit.source: To set this property, specify either the name of the template or an expression that returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Template>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置此属性，指定模板的名称，或者一个表达式，返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Template>。

trans-unit.source: Automatically formats the document.
trans-unit.target: 自动设置文档的格式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Kind" /> property to specify a format type.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Kind" /> 属性指定格式类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic formatting options override formatting restrictions in a document where formatting restrictions are in effect.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示自动格式设置选项是否重写具有格式设置限制的文档中的格式设置限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if automatic formatting options override formatting restrictions; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果自动格式设置选项重写格式设置限制，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic hyphenation is turned on for the specified document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否为指定的文档打开了自动断字功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if automatic hyphenation is turned on for the specified document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为指定的文档打开了自动断字功能，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> that represents the background image for the specified document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" />，该值表示指定文档的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> that represents the background image for the specified document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" />，表示指定文档的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: Backgrounds are visible only in Web layout view.
trans-unit.target: 背景是仅在 Web 版式视图中可见。

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the document closes.
trans-unit.target: 刚好在文档关闭之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The event occurs before the document closes.
trans-unit.target: 关闭文档之前发生该事件时。

trans-unit.source: To keep the document from closing, set the `Cancel` argument of the provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使文档无法关闭，设置`Cancel`所提供的自变量<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message box before the document closes.
trans-unit.target: 关闭文档之前，下面的代码示例显示一个消息框。

trans-unit.source: This example is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the editing area of the document window is double-clicked, before the default double-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在默认的双击操作执行之前，在文档窗口的编辑区域被双击时发生。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the default double-click action from occurring, set the `Cancel` argument of the provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止默认值双击操作的发生，请将设置`Cancel`所提供的自变量<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message when you double-click the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一条消息，当你双击文档。

trans-unit.source: This example is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: 在打印文档之前发生。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the document from printing, set the `Cancel` argument of the provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止打印该文档，将设置`Cancel`所提供的自变量<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message before the document is printed that asks whether you want to print the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一条消息，询问你是否想要打印文档打印文档前。

trans-unit.source: This example is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the editing area of the document window is right-clicked, before the default right-click action.
trans-unit.target: 在默认的右击操作执行之前，在文档窗口的编辑区域被右击时发生。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the default right-click action from occurring, set the `Cancel` argument of the provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止发生默认右键单击操作，将设置`Cancel`所提供的自变量<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message when you right-click the document.
trans-unit.target: 右键单击文档时，下面的代码示例将显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: This example is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the document is saved.
trans-unit.target: 在保存文档之前发生。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the document from being saved, set the `Cancel` argument of the provided <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止保存该文档，将设置`Cancel`所提供的自变量<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message before the document is saved that asks whether you want to save the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一条消息之前，询问是否要将文档保存到保存文档。

trans-unit.source: This example is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bibliography references contained within the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档内包含的书目引用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bibliography" /> that represents the bibliography references contained within the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bibliography" />，表示文档内包含的书目引用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks" /> collection that represents all the bookmarks in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有书签。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks" /> collection that represents all the bookmarks in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Bookmarks" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有书签。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a building block is inserted into a document.
trans-unit.target: 在将生成块插入到文档中时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties" /> collection that represents all the built-in document properties for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties" /> 集合，该集合表示文档的所有内置文档属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties" /> collection that represents all the built-in document properties for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties" /> 集合，表示文档的所有内置文档属性。

trans-unit.source: To return a single <xref:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperty> that represents a specific built-in document property, use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.BuiltInDocumentProperties%2A>(`index`) in Visual Basic or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.BuiltInDocumentProperties%2A>[`index`] in C#, where `index` is one of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBuiltInProperty> values.
trans-unit.target: 要返回单个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperty>表示特定的内置文档属性，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.BuiltInDocumentProperties%2A>(`index`) 在 Visual Basic 中或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.BuiltInDocumentProperties%2A>[`index`] 在 C# 中，其中`index`是之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBuiltInProperty>值。

trans-unit.source: If Microsoft Office Word does not define a value for one of the built-in document properties, reading the `Value` property for that document property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 不会定义一个内置文档属性的值，读取`Value`该文档属性的属性将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.CustomDocumentProperties%2A> property to return the collection of custom document properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.CustomDocumentProperties%2A>属性返回的自定义文档属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether Microsoft Office Word can check in the document to a server.
trans-unit.target: 确定 Microsoft Office Word 能否将文档签入服务器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word can check in the document to a server; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office 能够将文档签入服务器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To take advantage of the collaboration features built into Word, documents must be stored on a Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server.
trans-unit.target: 若要利用内置于 Word 的协作功能，必须在 Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server 存储文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Characters" /> collection that represents the characters in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Characters" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的字符。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Characters" /> collection that represents the characters in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Characters" /> 集合，表示文档中的字符。

trans-unit.source: Searches all text in a Japanese language document and displays instances where character usage is inconsistent for the same words.
trans-unit.target: 在日语文档中搜索所有文本，并显示相同的单词存在字符用法不一致的实例。

trans-unit.source: Begins a spelling and grammar check for the document.
trans-unit.target: 开始对文档进行拼写和语法检查。

trans-unit.source: If the document contains errors, this method displays the **Spelling and Grammar** dialog box, with the **Check grammar** check box selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档包含错误，此方法会显示**拼写和语法**对话框中，与**检查语法**复选框处于选中状态。

trans-unit.source: This method checks all available stories (such as headers, footers, and text boxes).
trans-unit.target: 此方法检查 （如页眉、 页脚和文本框） 的所有可用的情景。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to save the document to the server location.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则会将文档保存到服务器位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Comments for the revision of the document being checked in (only applies if <c>SaveChanges</c> is set to <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: 要签入的文档中修订的注释（仅在 <c>SaveChanges</c> 设置为 <see langword="true" /> 时适用）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow the user to publish the document after it is checked in.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在文档签入后发布该文档。

trans-unit.source: Puts a document on a server from a local computer, and sets the local document to read-only so that it cannot be edited locally.
trans-unit.target: 将本地计算机上的文档放在服务器上，并将本地文档设置为只读，以便它不能在本地编辑。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `MakePublic` parameter to `true` submits the document for the approval process, which can eventually result in a version of the document being published to users with read-only rights to the document (only applies if `SaveChanges` is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: 设置`MakePublic`参数`true`提交文档以供审批过程，并最终会导致具有对文档执行只读权限的用户发布的文档的版本 (仅适用于时`SaveChanges`设置为`true`).

trans-unit.source: To take advantage of the collaboration features built into Word, documents must be stored on a Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server.
trans-unit.target: 若要利用内置于 Word 的协作功能，必须在 Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server 存储文档。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to save the document to the server location.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则会将文档保存到服务器位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Comments for the revision of the document being checked in (only applies if <c>SaveChanges</c> is set to <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: 要签入的文档中修订的注释（仅在 <c>SaveChanges</c> 设置为 <see langword="true" /> 时适用）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow the user to publish the document after it is checked in.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则允许用户在文档签入后发布该文档。

trans-unit.source: Specifies versioning information for the document.
trans-unit.target: 指定文档的版本信息。

trans-unit.source: Puts a document on a server from a local computer, and sets the local document to read-only so that it cannot be edited locally.
trans-unit.target: 将本地计算机上的文档放在服务器上，并将本地文档设置为只读，以便它不能在本地编辑。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `MakePublic` parameter to `true` submits the document for the approval process, which can eventually result in a version of the document being published to users with read-only rights to the document (only applies if `SaveChanges` is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: 设置`MakePublic`参数`true`提交文档以供审批过程，并最终会导致具有对文档执行只读权限的用户发布的文档的版本 (仅适用于时`SaveChanges`设置为`true`).

trans-unit.source: To take advantage of the collaboration features built into Word, documents must be stored on a Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server.
trans-unit.target: 若要利用内置于 Word 的协作功能，必须在 Microsoft SharePoint Portal Server 存储文档。

trans-unit.source: Either an expression that returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> or the file name of the custom dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 或者是一个返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> 的表达式，或者是自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if capitalization is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略大小写，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.IgnoreUppercase" /> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.IgnoreUppercase" /> 属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> for Microsoft Office Word to always suggest alternative spellings.
trans-unit.target: 如果要让 Microsoft Office Word 始终建议替代拼写，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the current value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.SuggestSpellingCorrections" /> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则使用 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.SuggestSpellingCorrections" /> 属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Either an expression that returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> or the file name of an additional custom dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 或者是一个返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Dictionary" /> 的表达式，或者是附加的自定义字典的文件名。

trans-unit.source: You can specify as many as nine additional dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: 您最多可以指定九个附加字典。

trans-unit.source: Begins a spelling check for the document.
trans-unit.target: 开始对文档进行拼写检查。

trans-unit.source: If the document contains errors, this method displays the **Spelling and Grammar** dialog box, with the **Check grammar** check box cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档包含错误，此方法会显示**拼写和语法**对话框中，与**检查语法**清除复选框。

trans-unit.source: This method checks all available stories (such as headers, footers, and text boxes).
trans-unit.target: 此方法检查 （如页眉、 页脚和文本框） 的所有可用的情景。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestions" /> collection that represents the list of allowed elements for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> (which returns the root elements for all attached schemas) or for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> object (which returns the child elements of a specified element).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestions" /> 集合，该集合表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" />（返回所有附加架构的根元素）或 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象（返回指定元素的子元素）的允许元素的列表。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestions" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestions" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestion> in an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestions> collection is an item in the list of allowed possible XML elements at the bottom of the **XML Structure** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestion>中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestions>集合是在列表中的项允许在底部的 XML 的可能元素**XML 结构**任务窗格。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default paragraph style applied to text by the Click and Type feature in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由“即点即输”功能应用于文档中文本的默认段落样式。

trans-unit.source: The default paragraph style applied to text by the Click and Type feature in the document.
trans-unit.target: 由“即点即输”功能应用于文档中文本的默认段落样式。

trans-unit.source: To set this property, specify the local name of the style, an integer, a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBuiltinStyle> constant, or an object that represents the style.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置此属性，指定的样式，一个整数的本地名称<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdBuiltinStyle>常量或表示样式的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Style.InUse%2A> property for the specified style is set to `false`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Style.InUse%2A>属性指定的样式设置为`false`，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the save action for the document.
trans-unit.target: 指定文档的保存操作。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveOptions" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveOptions.wdDoNotSaveChanges" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveOptions.wdPromptToSaveChanges" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveOptions.wdSaveChanges" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveOptions" /> 值之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveOptions.wdDoNotSaveChanges" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveOptions.wdPromptToSaveChanges" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveOptions.wdSaveChanges" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the save format for the document.
trans-unit.target: 指定文档的保存格式。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOriginalFormat" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOriginalFormat.wdOriginalDocumentFormat" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOriginalFormat.wdPromptUser" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOriginalFormat.wdWordDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOriginalFormat" /> 值之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOriginalFormat.wdOriginalDocumentFormat" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOriginalFormat.wdPromptUser" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOriginalFormat.wdWordDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to route the document to the next recipient.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将文档传送给下一个收件人。

trans-unit.source: If the document does not have a routing slip attached, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为文档附加传送名单，则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: Closes the document.
trans-unit.target: 关闭文档。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the document is closed.
trans-unit.target: 在关闭文档时发生。

trans-unit.source: Switches the document from print preview to the previous view.
trans-unit.target: 将文档从打印预览切换到上一个视图。

trans-unit.source: If the document is not in print preview, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档未在打印预览中，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Represents co-authoring-related functionality in the document.
trans-unit.target: 表示文档中与共同创作相关的功能。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides access to co-authoring-related functionality in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于访问文档中与共同创作相关的功能的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property can provide information about whether there are any locks in the document, which users have current locks on the document, or whether or not updates to the document content is available from the server.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以提供有关信息是否存在任何锁在文档中，哪些用户对文档具有当前锁定，或者是否或不文档内容的更新可从服务器获得。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is used in a Word 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBars" /> collection that represents the menu bar and all the toolbars in Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBars" /> 集合，该集合表示 Microsoft Office Word 中的菜单栏和所有工具栏。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBars" /> collection that represents the menu bar and all the toolbars in Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CommandBars" /> 集合，表示 Microsoft Office Word 中的菜单栏和所有工具栏。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.CustomizationContext%2A> property to set the template or document context prior to accessing the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.CommandBars%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.CustomizationContext%2A>属性来设置之前访问的模板或文档上下文<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.CommandBars%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments" /> collection that represents all the comments in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有注释。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments" /> collection that represents all the comments in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有注释。

trans-unit.source: The name of the document with which the document is compared.
trans-unit.target: 要与该文档进行比较的文档的名称。

trans-unit.source: The reviewer name associated with the differences generated by the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 与比较操作生成的区别关联的审阅者姓名。

trans-unit.source: If unspecified, the value defaults to the author name of the revised document or the string "Comparison" if no author information is present.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的话，则该值默认为已修订文档的作者姓名，如果没有作者信息的话，则为字符串“Comparison”。

trans-unit.source: The target document for the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 要进行比较的目标文档。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompareTarget" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompareTarget" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> (default) for the comparison to include detection of format changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />（默认值），则在比较结果中包括检测到的格式更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> compares the documents without notifying a user of problems.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则对文档进行比较，而不通知用户有问题存在。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> adds the document to the list of recently used files on the **File** menu.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> removes date and time stamp information from tracked changes; <see langword="false" /> does not remove date and time stamp information from tracked changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则从修订中移除日期和时间戳信息；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则不从修订中移除日期和时间戳信息。

trans-unit.source: Displays revision marks that indicate where the document differs from another document.
trans-unit.target: 显示修订标记以指出该文档与其他文档的不同之处。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified compatibility option is enabled.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Compatibility%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Compatibility%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Compatibility%2A> property without specifying a parameter, it returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document_CompatibilityType> object that is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Compatibility%2A>未指定参数的属性，它返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document_CompatibilityType>不应在代码中直接使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility options affect how a document is displayed in Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 兼容性选项会影响 Microsoft Office Word 文档的显示方式。

trans-unit.source: Some of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompatibility> values might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you have selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompatibility>值可能不是提供给你，具体取决于的语言支持 （美国美式英语）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies the compatibility mode that Word uses when opening the document.

trans-unit.target: 值对应于之一<c>Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompatibilityMode</c>值。

trans-unit.source: When you open a document that was created in a previous version of Word, Compatibility Mode is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 打开在早期版本的 Word 中创建的文档时，兼容性模式将打开。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility Mode ensures that no new or enhanced features in [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] are available while working with a document, so that people who edit the document using previous versions of Word will have full editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 兼容性模式可确保在处理文档时，[!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 中没有新增或增强功能可用，以便使用早期版本的 Word 编辑文档的用户获得完全编辑功能。

trans-unit.target: 如果为 OLE 对象的其他应用程序中嵌入了文档，则此属性提供对指定的文档容器应用程序的访问。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a content control is added to a document.
trans-unit.target: 在内容控件添加到文档后发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before Microsoft Office Word updates the text in a content control, if the content control is bound to a custom XML part.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容控件绑定到自定义 XML 部件，则此事件就在 Microsoft Office Word 更新该内容控件中的文本之前发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before a content control is deleted from the document.
trans-unit.target: 在内容控件从文档中删除之前发生。

trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft Office Word 正要更新已绑定到内容控件的自定义 XML 部件中的数据之前（即在内容控件中的文本更改之后）发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks in a content control, or when the cursor is moved into a content control programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在内容控件中单击，或者以编程方式将光标移到内容控件中时发生。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the collection of native content controls in the document (that is, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControl?displayProperty=fullName> objects in the document).
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回文档中的本机内容控件的集合 (即，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControl?displayProperty=fullName>文档中的对象)。

trans-unit.source: To access the extended content controls in the document, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问扩展的内容控件在文档中，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Controls%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about extended content controls, see [Content Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关扩展的内容控件的详细信息，请参阅[内容控件](/visualstudio/vsto/content-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: A document in an Office solution can contain Windows Forms controls and host controls.

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Office 文档上的控件](/visualstudio/vsto/controls-on-office-documents.md)。

trans-unit.source: To manage the controls on a document at run time, use the methods and properties of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection> object returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要在运行时管理文档上的控件，请使用方法和属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection>返回对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Controls%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.target: 将文档转换为最新的文件格式并启用所有新功能。

trans-unit.target: 将自动断字创建的连字符转换为手动连字符。

trans-unit.source: The type of number to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的编号的类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be any of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberParagraph" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberListNum" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberAllNumbers" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是以下任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType" /> 值：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberParagraph" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberListNum" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberAllNumbers" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes the list numbers and LISTNUM fields in the specified document to text.
trans-unit.target: 将指定文档中的列表编号和 LISTNUM 字段更改为文本。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of numbers: preset numbers (<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberParagraph>), which you can add to paragraphs by selecting a template in the **Bullets and Numbering** dialog box; and LISTNUM fields (<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberListNum>), which enable you to add more than one number per paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 有两种类型的数字： 预设数字 (<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberParagraph>)，这可以通过选择中的模板添加到段落**项目符号和编号**对话框; 和 LISTNUM 字段 (<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberListNum>)，使您能够添加多个每个段落的一个数字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ConvertNumbersToText%2A> method is useful if you want to work with a document in another application and that application does not recognize list formatting or LISTNUM fields.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ConvertNumbersToText%2A>方法很有用，如果你想要使用另一个应用程序中的文档和列表格式或 LISTNUM 字段，该应用程序无法识别。

trans-unit.source: After you convert list numbers to text, you can no longer manipulate them in a list.
trans-unit.target: 将列表数字转换为文本后，你无法再在列表中处理它们。

trans-unit.source: Copies styles from the specified template to a document.

trans-unit.source: When styles are copied from a template to a document, like-named styles in the document are redefined to match the style descriptions in the template.
trans-unit.target: 当样式模板复制到文档时，文档中的名称类似的样式将重新定义为匹配的模板中描述的样式。

trans-unit.source: Unique styles from the template are copied to the document.
trans-unit.target: 模板中的唯一样式将复制到文档。

trans-unit.source: Unique styles in the document remain intact.
trans-unit.target: 在文档中的唯一样式保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The type of numbers to be counted.
trans-unit.target: 要进行计数的编号的类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType" /> values: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberParagraph" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberListNum" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberAllNumbers" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType" /> 值之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberParagraph" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberListNum" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberAllNumbers" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberAllNumbers" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberAllNumbers" />。

trans-unit.source: A number that corresponds to the numbering level you want to count.

trans-unit.source: The default is that all levels are counted.
trans-unit.target: 默认设置是对所有级别进行计数。

trans-unit.target: 文档中带项目符号或编号的项以及 LISTNUM 字段的数目。

trans-unit.source: Bulleted items are counted when either <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberParagraph> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberAllNumbers> (the default) is specified for `NumberType`.
trans-unit.target: 项目符号的项进行计数时请<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberParagraph>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberAllNumbers>（默认） 指定为`NumberType`。

trans-unit.source: There are two types of numbers: preset numbers (<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberParagraph>), which you can add to paragraphs by selecting a template in the **Bullets and Numbering** dialog box; and LISTNUM fields (<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberListNum>), which enable you to add more than one number per paragraph.
trans-unit.target: 有两种类型的数字： 预设数字 (<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberParagraph>)，这可以通过选择中的模板添加到段落**项目符号和编号**对话框; 和 LISTNUM 字段 (<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType.wdNumberListNum>)，使您能够添加多个每个段落的一个数字。

trans-unit.source: The mailing address of the person receiving the letter.
trans-unit.target: 收信人的邮件地址。

trans-unit.target: 信函的问候文本。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSalutationType" />。

trans-unit.source: The salutation type for the letter.
trans-unit.target: 信函的问候类型。

trans-unit.source: The reference line text for the letter (for example, "In reply to:").
trans-unit.target: 信函的参考行文本（例如，“In reply to:”）。

trans-unit.source: The mailing instruction text for the letter (for example, "Certified Mail").
trans-unit.target: 信函的邮件说明文本（例如，“Certified Mail”）。

trans-unit.source: The attention line text for the letter (for example, "Attention:").
trans-unit.target: 信函的提示行文本（例如，“Attention:”）。

trans-unit.source: The subject text for the specified letter.
trans-unit.target: 所指定信函的主题文本。

trans-unit.source: The names of the carbon copy (CC) recipients for the letter.
trans-unit.target: 信函的抄送 (CC) 收件人的姓名。

trans-unit.source: The text of the return mailing address for the letter.
trans-unit.target: 信函的回复邮件地址的文本。

trans-unit.source: The name of the person sending the letter.
trans-unit.target: 发信人的姓名。

trans-unit.source: The closing text for the letter.
trans-unit.target: 信函的结束语文本。

trans-unit.source: The company name of the person creating the letter.
trans-unit.target: 信函创建人所在公司的名称。

trans-unit.source: The job title of the person creating the letter.
trans-unit.target: 信函创建人的职务。

trans-unit.source: The initials of the person creating the letter.
trans-unit.target: 信函创建人的缩写。

trans-unit.source: The number of enclosures for the letter.
trans-unit.target: 信函的附件数目。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数
