trans-unit.source: Gets the application in which the document was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取在其中创建文档的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The application in which the document was created.
trans-unit.target: 在其中创建文档的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If the specified object was created in Microsoft Office Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的对象已在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建的此属性返回的十六进制数 4d535744，它表示字符串"MSWD。"

trans-unit.source: This value can also be represented by the constant <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdCreatorCode>.
trans-unit.target: 此值也可以表示由常数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdCreatorCode>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a random number that Microsoft Office Word assigns to changes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Microsoft Office Word 指派给文档中更改的一个随机数。

trans-unit.source: A random number that Microsoft Office Word assigns to changes in the document.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 分配给文档中更改的一个随机数。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.StoreRSIDOnSave%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.Options%2A> property is `true`, each time a document is saved, Word generates a random number that the application uses to facilitate comparing and merging documents.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.StoreRSIDOnSave%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.Options%2A>属性是`true`，每次保存文档时，Word 将生成一个随机数字，该应用程序使用以方便进行比较和合并文档。

trans-unit.source: Word stores the random numbers in a table and updates the table after each save.
trans-unit.target: Word 表中存储的随机数，并在每次保存后更新表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.CurrentRsid%2A> property returns the last number that Word assigned to the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.CurrentRsid%2A>属性返回的最后一个号分配给该文档该单词。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties" /> collection that represents all the custom document properties for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties" /> 集合，该集合表示文档的所有自定义文档属性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties" /> collection that represents all the custom document properties for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentProperties" /> 集合，表示文档的所有自定义文档属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.BuiltInDocumentProperties%2A> property to return the collection of built-in document properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.BuiltInDocumentProperties%2A>属性返回的内置文档属性的集合。

trans-unit.source: Properties of type <xref:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoDocProperties.msoPropertyTypeString> cannot exceed 255 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 类型的属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoDocProperties.msoPropertyTypeString>不能超过 255 个字符的长度。

trans-unit.source: Returns the custom XML parts in the document.
trans-unit.target: 返回文档中的自定义 XML 部件。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLParts</c> collection that contains the custom XML parts in the document.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLParts</c>文档中的集合，包含自定义 XML 部件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using custom XML parts in Office projects, see [Custom XML Parts Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用 Office 项目中的自定义 XML 部件的详细信息，请参阅[自定义 XML 部件概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-xml-parts-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Displays the **Data Form** dialog box, in which you can add, delete, or modify data records.
trans-unit.target: 显示“数据窗体”对话框，可以在该对话框中添加、删除或修改数据记录。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method with a mail merge main document, a mail merge data source, or any document that contains data delimited by table cells or separator characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用邮件合并主文档、 邮件合并数据源或任何包含数据以表格单元格或分隔符字符分隔的文档，可以使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the active document window loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 在活动文档窗口失去焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Deactivate> event does not occur when you unload the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Deactivate>事件不会在发生卸载文档。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message when the document is deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 停用文档时，下面的代码示例将显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: This example is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default extension for this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> 对象的默认扩展。

trans-unit.source: The default extension for this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> 对象的默认扩展。

trans-unit.source: The default extension is an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.IDocumentExtension> object that is implemented by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 默认扩展名是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.IDocumentExtension>对象由实现[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Gets the table style that is applied to all newly created tables in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用于文档中所有新创建的表的表样式。

trans-unit.source: The table style that is applied to all newly created tables in the document.
trans-unit.target: 应用于文档中所有新创建的表的表样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval (in points) between the default tab stops in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文档中默认制表位之间的间隔（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The interval (in points) between the default tab stops in the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档中默认制表位之间的间隔（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the browser frame in which to display a Web page reached through a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置浏览器框架，用于显示通过超链接访问的网页。

trans-unit.source: The browser frame in which to display a Web page reached through a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器框架，用于显示通过超链接访问的网页。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DefaultTargetFrame%2A> property has the following predefined strings: "_top", "_blank", "_parent", and "_self".
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DefaultTargetFrame%2A>属性具有以下预定义的字符串:"_top"，"_blank""_p"和"_self"。

trans-unit.source: It can also use any user-defined string.
trans-unit.target: 它还可以使用任何用户定义的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all comments from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments" /> collection in a document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments" /> 集合中删除所有注释。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments.Add%2A> method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments> object to add a comment to a document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments.Add%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Comments>对象将注释添加到文档。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all revisions in the document that are displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 删除文档中所有显示在屏幕上的修订。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEditorType" /> values that represents a group of users, or a user's e-mail alias (if in the same domain), or an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEditorType" /> 值之一，表示一组用户、用户的电子邮件别名（如果在同一个域中）或电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, no permissions are deleted from the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略的话，则不从文档中删除任何权限。

trans-unit.source: Deletes permissions in all ranges that the specified user or group of users has permission to modify.
trans-unit.target: 删除指定的用户或用户组对其拥有修改权限的全部范围中的权限。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Editor.DeleteAll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Editor?displayProperty=fullName> object to delete permissions in all ranges that a specified user or group of users has permission to modify.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Editor.DeleteAll%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Editor?displayProperty=fullName>对象删除指定的用户组有权修改的所有范围中的权限。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all handwritten ink annotations in the document.
trans-unit.target: 删除文档中的所有手写墨迹批注。

trans-unit.source: To work with ink annotations, you must be running Microsoft Office Word on a tablet computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用墨迹批注，您必须运行 Microsoft Office Word 的 tablet 计算机上。

trans-unit.source: For more information on adding handwritten ink annotations to a document, see "Mark up a document with ink annotations" in Microsoft Office Word Help.
trans-unit.target: 向文档添加手写的墨迹注释的详细信息，请参阅"标记具有墨迹批注的文档"Microsoft Office Word 帮助中。

trans-unit.source: Analyzes the text in the document to determine the language that it is written in.
trans-unit.target: 分析文档中的文本以确定它的编写语言。

trans-unit.source: The results of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DetectLanguage%2A> method are stored in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.LanguageID%2A> property on a character by character basis.
trans-unit.target: 结果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DetectLanguage%2A>方法存储在<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.LanguageID%2A>基于字符的字符的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DetectLanguage%2A> method checks all available text in the document (headers, footers, text boxes, and so forth).
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DetectLanguage%2A>方法检查文档 （标头、 页脚、 文本框中，和等） 中的所有可用的文本。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DetectLanguage%2A> method has already been applied to the specified text, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.LanguageDetected%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DetectLanguage%2A>方法已应用到指定的文本，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.LanguageDetected%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: To re-evaluate the language of the specified text, you must first set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.LanguageDetected%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新评估指定的文本的语言，必须首先设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.LanguageDetected%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all features introduced after the version specified in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> property are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否禁用在 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> 属性中指定的版本之后引入的所有功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all features introduced after the version specified in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> property are disabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> 属性中指定的版本之后引入的所有功能已禁用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects the document for which you set the property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只影响为其设置属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: Use this property if you plan on sharing a document between users with earlier versions of Microsoft Office Word, so you do not introduce features that are not available in their versions of Word.
trans-unit.target: 如果你打算共享与早期版本的 Microsoft Office Word 中，因此不引入其版本的 Word 中均不提供的功能的用户之间的文档，请使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DisableFeaturesbyDefault%2A> property to disable in all documents features introduced after a specified version.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DisableFeaturesbyDefault%2A>属性禁用在所有文档后，将指定的版本推出的功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether all features introduced after a specified version of Microsoft Office Word are disabled in the document only.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定在指定版本的 Microsoft Office Word 之后引入的所有功能是否仅在该文档中禁用。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DisableFeatures%2A> property must be set to `true` prior to setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DisableFeatures%2A>属性必须设置为`true`之前设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the setting will not take effect and will remain at its default setting of Word 97 for Windows.
trans-unit.target: 否则为设置才会生效，并且将保持为其的 Word 97 适用于 Windows 的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter%2A> property only affects the document for which the property is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfter%2A>属性只影响该属性设置的文档。

trans-unit.source: If you want to set a global option for the application to disable features for all documents, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfterbyDefault%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要设置要禁用的所有文档的功能，请使用的应用程序的全局选项<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DisableFeaturesIntroducedAfterbyDefault%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentInspectors" /> object that you can use to locate hidden personal information, such as author name, company name, and revision date.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentInspectors" /> 对象，使用该对象可以查找隐藏的个人信息（如作者姓名、公司名称和修订日期）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentInspectors" /> object that you can use to locate hidden personal information, such as author name, company name, and revision date.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentInspectors" /> 对象，使用该对象可以查找隐藏的个人信息（如作者姓名、公司名称和修订日期）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions" /> collection that represents the collection of versions of a shared document that has versioning enabled and that is stored in a document library on a server.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions" /> 集合，该集合表示已启用版本管理且存储在服务器文档库中的共享文档的版本集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.DocumentLibraryVersions" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Microsoft Office theme that is applied to the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用于文档的 Microsoft Office 主题。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.OfficeTheme" /> object that represents the Microsoft Office theme that is applied to the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.OfficeTheme" /> 对象，表示应用于文档的 Microsoft Office 主题。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ApplyDocumentTheme%2A> method to apply a Microsoft Office theme to the document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ApplyDocumentTheme%2A>方法以将 Microsoft Office 主题应用到文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word embeds common system fonts.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否嵌入常见的系统字体。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word does not embed common system fonts; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 不嵌入常见的系统字体，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` is useful if the user is on an East Asian system and wants to create a document that is readable by others who do not have fonts for that language on their system.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`false`如果用户位于东亚语言系统，并且想要创建的其他用户不具有针对其系统上的该语言的字体可读的文档非常有用。

trans-unit.source: For example, a user on a Japanese system could choose to embed the fonts in a document so that the Japanese document would be readable on all systems.
trans-unit.target: 例如，日语系统上的用户可以选择要在文档中嵌入字体，以便日语文档可在所有系统上可读。

trans-unit.source: Changes a document to the Word 97-2003 document format so that it can be edited in a previous version of Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 将文档更改为 Word 97-2003 文档格式，以便可以在以前版本的 Microsoft Office Word 中对其进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Email" /> object that contains all the e-mail–related properties of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Email" /> 对象，该对象包含与电子邮件相关的所有文档属性。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Email" /> object that contains all the e-mail–related properties of the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Email" /> 对象，包含与电子邮件相关的所有文档属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word embeds speech and handwriting and controls text service data received from devices connected to Microsoft Office using the Windows Text Service Framework Application Programming Interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否嵌入语音和手写功能，以及是否控制通过 Windows Text Service Framework 应用程序编程接口从连接到 Microsoft Office 的设备接收的文本服务数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word embeds speech and handwriting and controls text service data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 嵌入语音和手写功能并控制文本服务数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Office Word embeds speech and handwriting so that data can be converted back to speech or handwriting and to store East Asian IME keystrokes to improve correction.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 将嵌入到语音转换和手写，以便可以将数据转换回语音或手写以及存储的东亚 IME 击键以提高更正。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word embeds TrueType fonts in a document when the document is saved.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 在保存文档时是否在文档中嵌入 TrueType 字体。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word embeds TrueType fonts in a document when the document is saved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 在保存文档时在文档中嵌入 TrueType 字体，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Embedding TrueType fonts allows others to view the document with the same fonts that were used to create it.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入 TrueType 字体，其他人查看该文档可与用于创建它的相同字体。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the algorithm encryption provider that Microsoft Office Word uses when encrypting documents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Microsoft Office Word 在加密文档时使用的算法加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the algorithm encryption provider that Microsoft Office Word uses when encrypting documents.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 在加密文档时使用的算法加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> collection that represents all the endnotes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有尾注。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> collection that represents all the endnotes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Endnotes" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有尾注。

trans-unit.source: Terminates a review of a file that has been sent for review using the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SendForReview(System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@)" /> method or that has been automatically placed in a review cycle by sending a document to another user in an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 终止对某个文件的审阅，该文件已经发送以进行审阅（通过使用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SendForReview(System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@)" /> 方法），或者已经自动置于审阅阶段（通过以电子邮件形式将文档发送给另一个用户）。

trans-unit.source: When executed, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.EndReview%2A> method displays a message asking the user whether to end the review.
trans-unit.target: 在执行时，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.EndReview%2A>方法会显示一条消息询问用户是否结束审阅。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether formatting restrictions are enforced in a protected document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否在受保护的文档中实施格式设置限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if formatting restrictions are enforced in a protected document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在受保护文档中实施格式设置限制，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Envelope" /> that represents envelope functionality and the envelope in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示文档中信封功能和信封的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Envelope" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Envelope" /> that represents envelope functionality and the envelope in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示文档中信封功能和信封的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Envelope" />。

trans-unit.source: The path and file name of the new PDF or XPS file.
trans-unit.target: 新 PDF 或 XPS 文件的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportFormat" /> values that specifies whether to save the document in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportFormat" /> 值之一，指定是以 PDF 还是 XPS 格式保存文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to open the new file automatically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要自动打开新文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportOptimizeFor" /> values that specifies whether to optimize for screen or print.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportOptimizeFor" /> 值之一，指定进行屏幕优化还是打印优化。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange" /> values that specifies whether the export range is the entire document, the current page, a range of text, or the current selection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange" /> 值之一，指定导出范围是整个文档、当前页、文本范围还是当前选定内容。

trans-unit.source: The default is to export the entire document.
trans-unit.target: 默认设置为导出整个文档。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the starting page number, if the <c>Range</c> parameter is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange.wdExportFromTo" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定起始页码（如果 <c>Range</c> 参数设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange.wdExportFromTo" />）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the ending page number, if the <c>Range</c> parameter is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange.wdExportFromTo" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定结束页码（如果 <c>Range</c> 参数设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportRange.wdExportFromTo" />）。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportItem" /> values that specifies whether the export process includes text only or includes text with markup.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportItem" /> 值之一，指定导出过程是仅包括文本，还是同时包括文本和标记。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include document properties in the new file; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在新文件中包含文档属性，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to copy Information Rights Management (IRM) permissions to an XPS document if the source document has IRM protections; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在源文档具有信息权限管理 (IRM) 保护时将 IRM 权限复制到 XPS 文档，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportCreateBookmarks" /> values that specifies whether to export bookmarks and the type of bookmarks to export.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdExportCreateBookmarks" /> 值之一，指定是否导出书签以及要导出的书签类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include extra data to help screen readers, such as information about the flow and logical organization of the content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包含额外数据（如有关内容的流和逻辑组织的信息）来协助使用屏幕读取器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include a bitmap of the text; <see langword="false" /> to reference the text font.
trans-unit.target: 如果要包含文本的位图，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果要引用文本字体，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set this parameter to <see langword="true" /> when font licenses do not permit a font to be embedded in the PDF file.
trans-unit.target: 如果字体许可证不允许在 PDF 文件中嵌入某种字体，则将此参数设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set this to <see langword="false" />, the viewer's computer substitutes an appropriate font if the specified one is not available.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此参数设置为 <see langword="false" />，则当指定字体不可用时，查看者的计算机会替换合适的字体。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to limit PDF usage to the PDF subset standardized as ISO 19005-1; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要将 PDF 使用范围限制为按照 ISO 19005-1 进行标准化的 PDF 子集，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set this parameter to <see langword="true" />, the resulting files are more reliably self-contained but may be larger or show more visual artifacts due to the restrictions of the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此参数设置为 <see langword="true" />，则生成的文件会是更加可靠的独立文件，但这些文件可能会更大，或者由于格式限制而显示更多的视觉瑕疵。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an implementation of the <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> interface that enables the document to be saved in a different fixed format.
trans-unit.target: 一个指针，指向使文档能够以其他固定格式保存的 <see langword="IMsoDocExporter" /> 接口的实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Extending the Office (2007) Fixed-Format Export Feature.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅“扩展 Office (2007) 固定格式导出功能”。

trans-unit.source: Saves the document in PDF or XPS format.
trans-unit.target: 以 PDF 或 XPS 格式保存文档。

trans-unit.source: You can save as a PDF or XPS file from Microsoft Office Word only after you install an add-in that provides this feature.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将保存为 PDF 或 XPS 文件从 Microsoft Office Word 仅后提供此功能的外接程序安装。

trans-unit.source: For more information, search for "Enable support for other file formats, such as PDF and XPS" on Office Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，搜索"启用支持对其他文件格式，例如 PDF 和 XPS"Office online。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a custom extension for this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> 对象的自定义扩展。

trans-unit.source: A custom extension for this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> 对象的自定义扩展。

trans-unit.source: A custom extension is an implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.IDocumentExtension> interface in a Word solution that is created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 自定义扩展是一种实现的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.IDocumentExtension>通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的 Word 解决方案中的接口。

trans-unit.source: In document-level projects, this property returns an instance of the generated `ThisDocument` class by default.
trans-unit.target: 在文档级项目中，此属性返回生成一个实例`ThisDocument`默认情况下的类。

trans-unit.source: The `ThisDocument` class implements the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.IDocumentExtension> interface through the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase> class.
trans-unit.target: `ThisDocument`类实现<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.IDocumentExtension>接口通过<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.DocumentBase>类。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programming Document-Level Customizations](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[文档级自定义项编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programming-document-level-customizations.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the East Asian language to use when breaking lines of text in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在对文档中的文本进行换行时使用的东亚语言。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFarEastLineBreakLanguageID" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFarEastLineBreakLanguageID" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line break control level for the specified document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定文档的分行控制级别。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFarEastLineBreakLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdFarEastLineBreakLevel" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Paragraph.FarEastLineBreakControl%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Paragraph.FarEastLineBreakControl%2A> 属性设置为 `false`，则忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Fields" /> collection that contains the fields in the main text story.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个只读 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Fields" /> 集合，该集合包含主文档内容中的字段。

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Fields" /> collection that represents all the fields in the main text story.
trans-unit.target: 一个只读 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Fields" /> 集合，表示主文档内容中的所有字段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the document is final.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文档是否处于最终状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document is final; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档处于最终状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `true`, Microsoft Office Word marks the document as final, notifies recipients (if any) that the document is final, and sets the document to read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为`true`，Microsoft Office Word 将标记为最终状态的文档，通知收件人，（如果有），该文档处于最终状态，并将文档设置为只读的。

trans-unit.source: Decreases the font size of text just enough so that the document will fit on one fewer pages.
trans-unit.target: 将文本的字号减至足够小，以便将文档放在尽可能少的页上。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if Microsoft Office Word is unable to reduce the page count by one.
trans-unit.target: 异常是由一个引发如果 Microsoft Office Word 无法减少页计数。

trans-unit.source: The address of the target document.
trans-unit.target: 目标文档的地址。

trans-unit.source: The location within the target document.
trans-unit.target: 目标文档中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the target location in a new window.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在新窗口中显示目标位置。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add the link to the current day's history folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则添加指向当前日期的历史记录文件夹的链接。

trans-unit.source: A string or a byte array that specifies additional information for HTTP to use to resolve the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串或字节数组，为 HTTP 指定要用来解析超链接的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use <c>ExtraInfo</c> to specify the coordinates of an image map, the contents of a form, or a FAT file name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用 <c>ExtraInfo</c> 指定图像映射的坐标、窗体的内容或 FAT 文件名。

trans-unit.source: The string is either posted or appended, depending on the value of <c>Method</c>.
trans-unit.target: 字符串可以发送，也可以追加，具体情况取决于 <c>Method</c> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Hyperlink.ExtraInfoRequired" /> property to determine whether extra information is required.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Hyperlink.ExtraInfoRequired" /> 属性确定是否需要额外的信息。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the way additional information for HTTP is handled.
trans-unit.target: 指定其他 HTTP 信息的处理方式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoExtraInfoMethod" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoExtraInfoMethod" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies header information for the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定 HTTP 请求的标头信息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic, you can combine several header lines into a single string by using the following syntax: "string1 <see langword="" & vbCr & "" />string2 ".
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中，可以通过使用如下语法将几个标题行合并到一个字符串中：“string1 <see langword="" & vbCr & "" />string2 ”。

trans-unit.source: The specified string is automatically converted into ANSI characters.
trans-unit.target: 指定的字符串自动转换为 ANSI 字符。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <c>HeaderInfo</c> argument might overwrite default HTTP header fields.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，HeaderInfo 参数可以覆盖默认的 HTTP 标头字段<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: Resolves a hyperlink, or displays a cached document if the document has already been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 解析超链接，或者如果文档已经下载的话，则显示缓存的文档。

trans-unit.source: This method displays the cached document located at the `Address` parameter, if it has already been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会显示对缓存的文档位于`Address`参数，如果已下载。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method resolves the hyperlink, downloads the target document, and displays the document in the appropriate application.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法解析超链接，下载目标文档并在适当的应用程序中显示此文档。

trans-unit.source: If the hyperlink uses the file protocol, this method opens the document instead of downloading it.
trans-unit.target: 如果超链接使用文件协议，此方法将打开的文档而不是下载它。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Footnotes" /> collection that represents all the footnotes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Footnotes" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有脚注。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Footnotes" /> collection that represents all the footnotes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Footnotes" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有脚注。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word shows **Clear Formatting** in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否在“样式和格式”任务窗格中显示“清除格式”。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word shows **Clear Formatting** in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果 Microsoft Office Word 显示**清除格式**中**样式和格式**任务窗格中; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdShowFilter" /> constant that represents the styles and formatting displayed in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdShowFilter" /> 常数，该常数表示“样式和格式”任务窗格中显示的样式和格式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdShowFilter" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdShowFilter" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word displays font formatting in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否在“样式和格式”任务窗格中显示字体格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word displays font formatting in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果 Microsoft Office Word 显示字体中的格式设置**样式和格式**任务窗格中; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word shows the next heading level when the previous heading level is used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否在使用上一个标题级别时显示下一个标题级别。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true " />if Word shows the next heading level when the previous heading level is used; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Word 在使用上一个标题级别时显示下一个标题级别，则为 <see langword="true " />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the **Show next heading when previous level is used** check box in the **Style Pane Options** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于**之前级别使用时显示下一个标题**中的复选框**样式窗格选项**对话框。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word displays number formatting in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否在“样式和格式”任务窗格中显示数字格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word displays number formatting in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果 Microsoft Office Word 显示中的数字格式设置**样式和格式**任务窗格中; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word displays paragraph formatting in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否在“样式和格式”任务窗格中显示段落格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word displays paragraph formatting in the **Styles and Formatting** task pane; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果 Microsoft Office Word 显示中的段落格式设置**样式和格式**任务窗格中; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to show user-defined styles.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示用户定义的样式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true " />to show user-defined styles; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示用户定义的样式，则为 <see langword="true " />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the **Hide built-in name when alternate name exists** check box in the **Style Pane Options** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于**隐藏内置名称存在替换名称时**中的复选框**样式窗格选项**对话框。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.FormattingShowUserStyleName%2A> property to `true` hides built-in styles when alternate user-defined styles exist.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.FormattingShowUserStyleName%2A>属性`true`时备用用户定义的样式存在隐藏内置样式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user creates a heading style with the same name as a built-in style, the user-defined style takes precedence and the built-in style is not shown in the list of style names.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户具有相同名称作为内置样式创建标题样式，则用户定义的样式优先，内置的样式的样式名称的列表中不会显示。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.FormFields" /> collection that represents all the form fields in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.FormFields" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有窗体字段。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.FormFields" /> collection that represents all the form fields in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.FormFields" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有窗体字段。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the document is in form design mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示文档是否处于窗体设计模式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document is in form design mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档处于窗体设计模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` if it is used in code run from Microsoft Office Word, but it returns the correct value if it is run through automation.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回`false`如果它用于从 Microsoft Office Word 中，运行的代码中，但如果它通过自动化运行，它会返回正确的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you run the example from Microsoft Office Excel, it returns `true` if you are in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果从 Microsoft Office Excel 中运行该示例，它返回`true`如果你在设计模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Frames" /> collection that represents all the frames in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Frames" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有框架。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Frames" /> collection that represents all the frames in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Frames" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有框架。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Frameset" /> that represents an entire frames page or a single frame on a frames page.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示整个框架页或框架页上单个框架的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Frameset" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Frameset" /> that represents an entire frames page or a single frame on a frames page.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示整个框架页或框架页上单个框架的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Frameset" />。

trans-unit.source: Fixes the layout of the document in Web view as it currently appears so that line breaks remain fixed and ink annotations do not move when you resize the window.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 视图中将文档的布局固定为当前显示的布局，以便在调整窗口大小时使换行符保持固定且墨迹批注不会移动。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the document, including the drive or Web path.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的名称（包括驱动器或 Web 路径）。

trans-unit.source: The name of the document, including the drive or Web path.
trans-unit.target: 文档的名称（包括驱动器或 Web 路径）。

trans-unit.source: Using this property is equivalent to using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Path%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Name%2A> properties in sequence.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性等效于使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Path%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Name%2A>序列中的属性。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceType" /> values that specifies the type of item you want to insert a cross-reference to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdReferenceType" /> 值之一，用于指定项（要插入对该项的交叉引用）的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of items that can be cross-referenced based on the specified cross-reference type.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可基于指定的交叉引用类型进行交叉引用的项数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of items that can be cross-referenced based on the specified cross-reference type.
trans-unit.target: 一个可基于指定的交叉引用类型进行交叉引用的项数组。

trans-unit.source: The array corresponds to the items listed in the **For which** box in the **Cross-reference** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 该数组对应于中列出的项**为其**框中**交叉引用**对话框。

trans-unit.source: An item returned by this method can be used as the `ReferenceWhich` argument for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertCrossReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的项可用作`ReferenceWhich`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Bookmark.InsertCrossReference%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves letter elements from the document and returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" />.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中检索信函元素并返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the workflow tasks that are assigned to the document.
trans-unit.target: 返回指派给文档的工作流任务。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.WorkflowTasks" /> collection that contains the workflow tasks that are assigned to the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.WorkflowTasks" /> 集合，包含分配给文档的工作流任务。

trans-unit.source: Returns the workflow templates that are attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 返回附加到文档的工作流模板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.WorkflowTemplates" /> collection that contains the workflow templates that are attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.WorkflowTemplates" /> 集合，包含附加到文档的工作流模板。

trans-unit.source: The kind of item to which the range or selection is moved.
trans-unit.target: 要将范围或选定内容移到其中的项的种类。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The item to which the range or selection is moved.
trans-unit.target: 要将范围或选定内容移到其中的项。

trans-unit.source: Can be one of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The number of the item in the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档中项的编号。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Only positive values are valid.
trans-unit.target: 只有正数值才有效。

trans-unit.source: To specify an item that precedes the range or selection, use <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection.wdGoToPrevious" /> as the <c>Which</c> argument and specify a <c>Count</c> value.
trans-unit.target: 要指定位于范围或选定内容前面的项，请将 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToDirection.wdGoToPrevious" /> 用作 <c>Which</c> 参数并指定 <c>Count</c> 值。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>What</c> argument is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToBookmark" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToComment" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToField" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToObject" />, this argument specifies a name.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>What</c> 参数是 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToBookmark" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToComment" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToField" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToObject" />，则此参数指定一个名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> that represents the start position of the specified item, such as a page, bookmark, or field.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示指定项（如页、书签或字段）的起始位置的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> that represents the start position of the specified item, such as a page, bookmark, or field.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示指定项（如页、书签或字段）的起始位置的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: When you use this method with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToGrammaticalError>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToProofreadingError>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToSpellingError> constant, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range> that is returned includes any grammar error text or spelling error text.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用此方法与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToGrammaticalError>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToProofreadingError>，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdGoToItem.wdGoToSpellingError>常量，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range>返回包括任何语法错误的文本或拼写错误的文本。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a grammar check has been run on the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否已针对文档运行语法检查。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a grammar check has been run on the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已针对文档运行语法检查，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To recheck the grammar in the document, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GrammarChecked%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新检查文档中的语法，将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GrammarChecked%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> collection that represents the sentences that failed the grammar check on the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中未通过语法检查的句子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> collection that represents the sentences that failed the grammar check on the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> 集合，表示文档中未通过语法检查的句子。

trans-unit.source: There can be more than one error per sentence.
trans-unit.target: 可以有多个错误，每个句子。

trans-unit.source: If there are no grammatical errors, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors.Count%2A> property for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors> object returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GrammaticalErrors%2A> property returns 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何语法错误，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors.Count%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors>返回对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GrammaticalErrors%2A>属性都返回 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of horizontal space between the invisible gridlines that Microsoft Office Word uses when you draw, move, and resize AutoShapes or East Asian characters in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当您在文档中对自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动和大小调整时，Microsoft Office Word 所使用的不可见网格线之间的水平间隔量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of horizontal space between the invisible gridlines that Microsoft Office Word uses when you draw, move, and resize AutoShapes or East Asian characters in the document.
trans-unit.target: 当您在文档中对自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动和大小调整时，Microsoft Office Word 所使用的不可见网格线之间的水平间隔量。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of vertical space between the invisible gridlines that Microsoft Office Word uses when you draw, move, and resize AutoShapes or East Asian characters in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当您在文档中对自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动和大小调整时，Microsoft Office Word 所使用的不可见网格线之间的垂直间隔量。

trans-unit.source: The amount of vertical space between the invisible gridlines that Microsoft Office Word uses when you draw, move, and resize AutoShapes or East Asian characters in the document.
trans-unit.target: 当您在文档中对自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动和大小调整时，Microsoft Office Word 所使用的不可见网格线之间的垂直间隔量。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word starts the character grid from the upper-left corner of the page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否从页的左上角启动字符网格。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word starts the character grid from the upper-left corner of the page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 从页的左上角启动字符网格，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GridOriginFromMargin%2A> is false, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GridOriginHorizontal%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GridOriginVertical%2A> are used.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GridOriginFromMargin%2A>为 false，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GridOriginHorizontal%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GridOriginVertical%2A>使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the point, relative to the left edge of the page, where you want the invisible grid for drawing, moving, and resizing AutoShapes or East Asian characters to begin in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个相对于页面左边缘的点，文档中用来对自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动和大小调整的不可见网格将从该点开始。

trans-unit.source: The point, relative to the left edge of the page, where you want the invisible grid for drawing, moving, and resizing AutoShapes or East Asian characters to begin in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个相对于页面左边缘的点，文档中用来对自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动和大小调整的不可见网格将从该点开始。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GridOriginFromMargin%2A> must be false for this property to be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GridOriginFromMargin%2A> 必须是要使用此属性为 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the point, relative to the top of the page, where you want the invisible grid for drawing, moving, and resizing AutoShapes or East Asian characters to begin in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个相对于页面顶部的点，文档中要用来对自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动和大小调整的不可见网格将从该点开始。

trans-unit.source: The point, relative to the top of the page, where you want the invisible grid for drawing, moving, and resizing AutoShapes or East Asian characters to begin in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个相对于页面顶部的点，文档中要用来对自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动和大小调整的不可见网格将从该点开始。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GridOriginFromMargin%2A> must be false for this property to be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GridOriginFromMargin%2A> 必须是要使用此属性为 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval at which Microsoft Office Word displays horizontal character gridlines in print layout view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Microsoft Office Word 在页面视图中显示水平字符网格线的间隔。

trans-unit.source: The interval at which Microsoft Office Word displays horizontal character gridlines in print layout view.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 在页面视图中显示水平字符网格线的间隔。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval at which Microsoft Office Word displays vertical character gridlines in print layout view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Microsoft Office Word 在页面视图中显示垂直字符网格线的间隔。

trans-unit.source: The interval at which Microsoft Office Word displays vertical character gridlines in print layout view.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 在页面视图中显示垂直字符网格线的间隔。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a password is required to open the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示打开文档是否需要密码。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a password is required to open the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果打开文档需要密码，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the document has an attached Microsoft Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) project.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示文档是否具有附加的 Microsoft Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) 项目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document has an attached VBA project; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档具有附加 VBA 项目，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is most useful in programmatically determining whether a document needs to be saved into a macro-enabled file format.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是在以编程方式确定是否需要为启用宏的文件格式保存文档中最有用。

trans-unit.source: If saved in another format, macros and code projects contained within the document may be lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果保存在另一种格式中，宏和包含在文档内的代码项目可能会丢失。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.HTMLDivisions" /> object that represents an HTML division in a Web document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.HTMLDivisions" /> 对象，该对象表示 Web 文档中的 HTML 分段。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.HTMLDivisions" /> object that represents an HTML division in a Web document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.HTMLDivisions" /> 对象，表示 Web 文档中的 HTML 分段。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Hyperlinks" /> collection that represents all the hyperlinks in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Hyperlinks" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有超链接。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Hyperlinks" /> collection that represents all the hyperlinks in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Hyperlinks" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有超链接。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether words in all capital letters can be hyphenated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否可以对全部是大写字母的单词断字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if words in all capital letters can be hyphenated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以对全部是大写字母的单词断字，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the hyphenation zone, in points.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置断字区域的宽度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The width of the hyphenation zone, in points.
trans-unit.target: 断字区域的宽度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The hyphenation zone is the maximum amount of space that Microsoft Office Word leaves between the end of the last word in a line and the right margin.
trans-unit.target: 连字区域是空间的最大的 Microsoft Office Word 离开的行中最后一个单词末尾和右边距之间量。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document" /> 的基础本机对象。

trans-unit.source: You cannot pass a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object to a method or property in the Word object model that expects a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 不能将传递<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>到方法或要求 Word 对象模型中的属性的对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.InnerObject%2A> property to access the underlying <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>, and then you can pass this object to a method or property that expects a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.InnerObject%2A>属性来访问基础<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>，然后将此对象传递给方法或属性需要<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the document is a master document.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document is a master document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该文档是主控文档，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A master document includes one or more subdocuments.
trans-unit.target: 主文档包括一个或多个子文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the document is opened in a separate document window as a subdocument of a master document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示是否在一个单独的文档窗口中以主控文档的子文档形式打开文档。

trans-unit.target: 如果在一个单独的文档窗口中以主控文档的子文档形式打开文档，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdJustificationMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word kerns half-width Latin characters and punctuation marks in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否自动缩紧文档中的半宽拉丁字符和标点符号。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word kerns half-width Latin characters and punctuation marks in the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 自动缩紧文档中的半宽拉丁字符和标点符号，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format type that Microsoft Office Word uses when automatically formatting the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Microsoft Office Word 在自动设置文档格式时使用的格式类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDocumentKind" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDocumentKind" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word has detected the language of the text in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否检测到文档中文本的语言。

trans-unit.target: 如果 Word 检测到文档的语言，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range.LanguageID%2A>的结果的任何以前的语言检测的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.LanguageDetected%2A> property is set to `true` when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DetectLanguage%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.LanguageDetected%2A>属性设置为`true`时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.DetectLanguage%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: To reevaluate the language of the specified text, you must first set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.LanguageDetected%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新计算指定的文本的语言，必须首先设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.LanguageDetected%2A>属性`false`。
