trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies where Microsoft Office Word places binary operators when equations span two or more lines.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在公式跨越两行或更多行时 Microsoft Office Word 放置二元运算符的位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: When the equation breaks on a binary operator—for example, an addition, subtraction, or multiplication operator—there are three different placements of the operator: before the break, after the break, and repeated both before and after the break.
trans-unit.target: 公式时将在一个二元运算符处中断 — 例如，加法、 减法或乘法运算符 — 有三个不同的运算符的放置方式： 换行符之前、 之后、 在换行，并且重复之前和之后中断。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.OMathBreakSub%2A> property to specify how Word treats subtraction operators that appear before a line break.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.OMathBreakSub%2A>属性来指定如何 Word 将出现在行中断之前的减法运算符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how Microsoft Office Word handles a subtraction operator that falls before a line break.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 Microsoft Office Word 如何处理位于换行符之前的减法运算符。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakSub" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakSub" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This property is used only when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.OMathBreakBin%2A> property is set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性仅当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.OMathBreakBin%2A>属性设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathBreakBin.wdOMathBreakBinRepeat>。

trans-unit.source: Subtraction sometimes receives special treatment when a line break falls on a subtraction operator and the document setting is to repeat the subtraction operator on the following line, because two negatives make a positive.
trans-unit.target: 换行符落在减法运算符上和文档设置为重复减法运算符上的以下行，因为两个减号得正时，有时减法接收特殊处理。

trans-unit.source: Some writers choose to convert one of the minus signs into a plus sign, and some choose to keep the two negatives.
trans-unit.target: 某些编写器选择一个减号转换加号，而某些选择保留两个减号。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the font that is used in a document to display equations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于在文档中显示公式的字体的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the font used in a document to display equations.
trans-unit.target: 用于在文档中显示公式的字体的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the default location of limits for integrals.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定整型的默认限制位置。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that specifies the default location of limits for integrals.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定整型的默认限制位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the default justification—left, right, centered, or centered as a group—of a group of equations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示一组公式的默认对齐方式（左对齐、右对齐、居中或作为一组居中）。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathJc" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdOMathJc" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the left margin for equations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定公式的左边距。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the left margin for equations.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定公式的左边距的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the default location of limits for *n*-ary objects other than integrals.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定除整型之外的 n 元对象的默认限制位置。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that specifies the default location of limits for *n*-ary objects other than integrals.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定的限制的默认位置* n *-整型之外。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the right margin for equations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示公式的右边距。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the right margin for equations.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定公式的右边距的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.OMath" /> objects in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档中 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.OMath" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.OMaths" /> collection that contains the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.OMath" /> objects in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.OMaths" /> 集合，包含文档中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.OMath" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use small fractions in equations contained within the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在文档中包含的公式中使用小分数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use small fractions in equations contained within the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在文档中包含的公式中使用小分数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the placement of the second line of an equation that wraps to a new line.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定换行到新行的公式的第二行的位置。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the placement of the second line of an equation that wraps to a new line.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指定换行到新行的公式的第二行的位置。

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 specifies that the continuation of the equation is right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: 值-1 指定的等式延续是右对齐。

trans-unit.source: All positive values indicate the indent from the left margin.
trans-unit.target: 所有正值都指示左边距中的缩进。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the document is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在打开文档时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets the encoding used to open the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于打开文档的编码。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word optimizes the document for viewing in Word 97 by disabling any incompatible formatting.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否通过禁用任何不兼容的格式来优化要在 Word 97 中查看的文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word optimizes the document for viewing in Word 97 by disabling any incompatible formatting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 通过禁用任何不兼容的格式来优化要在 Word 97 中查看的文档，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To optimize all new documents for Word 97 by default, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.OptimizeForWord97byDefault%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要优化针对 Word 97 默认情况下的所有新的文档，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.OptimizeForWord97byDefault%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the title of the original document after performing a legal-blackline document compare operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取执行显示更改的文档比较操作后的原始文档的标题。

trans-unit.source: The title of the original document after performing a legal-blackline document compare operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行显示更改的文档比较操作后的原始文档的标题。

trans-unit.source: To perform a legal-blackline document compare operation, use the `CompareDocuments` method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Application%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行精确比较文档的比较操作，使用`CompareDocuments`方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Application%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.PageSetup" /> that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个与文档关联的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.PageSetup" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.PageSetup" /> that is associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个与文档关联的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.PageSetup" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Paragraphs" /> collection that represents all the paragraphs in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Paragraphs" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有段落。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Paragraphs" /> collection that represents all the paragraphs in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Paragraphs" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有段落。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent object of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的父对象。

trans-unit.source: The parent object of the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档的父对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets a password that must be supplied to open the document.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个为打开文档而必须提供的密码。

trans-unit.source: A password that must be supplied to open the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个为打开文档而必须提供的密码。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications.
trans-unit.target: 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。

trans-unit.source: Gets the algorithm Microsoft Office Word uses for encrypting documents with passwords.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Microsoft Office Word 在用密码对文档加密时使用的算法。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm Microsoft Office Word uses for encrypting documents with passwords.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 在用密码对文档加密时使用的算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to specify the algorithm that Word uses for encrypting documents with passwords.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法，以指定用于加密密码与文档使用 Word 的算法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word encrypts file properties for password-protected documents.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否对受密码保护的文档的文件属性进行加密。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word encrypts file properties for password-protected documents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 对受密码保护的文档的文件属性进行加密，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to specify whether Word encrypts file properties for password-protected documents.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法，以指定 Word 是否对文件属性受密码保护的文档进行加密。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key length of the algorithm Microsoft Office Word uses when encrypting documents with passwords.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Microsoft Office Word 在用密码对文档加密时所用算法的密钥长度。

trans-unit.source: The key length of the algorithm Microsoft Office Word uses when encrypting documents with passwords.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 在用密码对文档加密时所用算法的密钥长度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to specify the key length that Word uses when encrypting documents with passwords.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>用密码对文档方法，以指定 Word 加密时使用的密钥长度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the algorithm encryption provider that Microsoft Office Word uses when encrypting documents with passwords.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Microsoft Office Word 在用密码对文档加密时使用的算法加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the algorithm encryption provider that Microsoft Office Word uses when encrypting documents with passwords.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office Word 在用密码对文档加密时使用的算法加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A> method to specify the name of the algorithm encryption provider that Word uses when encrypting documents with passwords.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SetPasswordEncryptionOptions%2A>方法，以指定 Word 用密码对文档加密时使用的算法加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the disk or Web path of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的磁盘路径或 Web 路径。

trans-unit.source: The disk or Web path of the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档的磁盘路径或 Web 路径。

trans-unit.source: The path does not include a trailing character—for example, "C:\MSOffice" or "http://MyServer".
trans-unit.target: 路径不包括尾随字符-例如，"C:\MSOffice"或"http://MyServer"。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A> property to add the character that separates folders and drive letters.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A>属性来添加分隔文件夹和驱动器号的字符。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Name%2A> property to return the file name without the path and use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.FullName%2A> property to return the file name and the path together.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Name%2A>属性以返回无的路径和使用的文件名<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.FullName%2A>属性一起返回的文件名和路径。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A> property to build Web addresses even though they contain forward slashes (/) and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A> property defaults to a backslash (\\).
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A>属性来生成 Web 地址，即使它们包含正斜杠 （/） 和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PathSeparator%2A>属性默认为反斜杠 (\\)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Permission" /> that represents the permission settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示文档的权限设置的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Permission" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Permission" /> that represents the permission settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示文档的权限设置的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Permission" />。

trans-unit.source: Posts the document to a public folder in Microsoft Exchange.
trans-unit.target: 将文档发送到 Microsoft Exchange 中的公共文件夹。

trans-unit.source: This method displays the **Send to Exchange Folder** dialog box so that a folder can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 此方法显示“发送到 Exchange 文件夹”对话框，以便文件夹可以被选定。

trans-unit.source: Opens Microsoft Office PowerPoint with the document loaded.
trans-unit.target: 打开 Microsoft Office PowerPoint 并加载该文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word prints onto a preprinted form only the data entered in the corresponding online form.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否仅将在相应的联机窗体中输入的数据打印到预打印的窗体上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word prints onto a preprinted form only the data entered in the corresponding online form; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 仅将在相应的联机窗体中输入的数据打印到预打印的窗体上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the document is formatted to use fractional point spacing to display and print characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文档的格式是否被设置为使用小数点间距来显示和打印字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document is formatted to use fractional point spacing to display and print characters; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档的格式被设置为使用小数点间距来显示和打印字符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have the customization code continue while Microsoft Office Word prints the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则可以让自定义代码在 Microsoft Office Word 打印文档时继续工作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to append the document to the file specified by the <c>OutputFileName</c> argument; <see langword="false" /> to overwrite the contents of <c>OutputFileName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则会将文档追加到 <c>OutputFileName</c> 参数指定的文件；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则会覆盖 <c>OutputFileName</c> 的内容。

trans-unit.source: The page range.
trans-unit.target: 页面范围。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If <c>PrintToFile</c> is <see langword="true" />, this argument specifies the path and file name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>PrintToFile</c> 为 <see langword="true" />，则此参数指定输出文件的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: The starting page number when <c>Range</c> is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange.wdPrintFromTo" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <c>Range</c> 设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange.wdPrintFromTo" /> 时的起始页码。

trans-unit.source: The ending page number when <c>Range</c> is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange.wdPrintFromTo" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <c>Range</c> 设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutRange.wdPrintFromTo" /> 时的结束页码。

trans-unit.source: The item to be printed.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的项。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutItem" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutItem" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The number of copies to be printed.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的份数。

trans-unit.source: The page numbers and page ranges to be printed, separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的页码和页码范围，由逗号分隔。

trans-unit.source: For example, "2, 6-10" prints page 2 and pages 6 through 10.
trans-unit.target: 例如，“2, 6-10”将打印第 2 页以及从第 6 页到第 10 页之间的内容。

trans-unit.source: The type of pages to be printed.
trans-unit.target: 要打印的页面的类型。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutPages" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdPrintOutPages" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to send printer instructions to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将打印机指令发送到文件。

trans-unit.source: Make sure to specify a file name with <c>OutputFileName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 请确保使用 <c>OutputFileName</c> 指定一个文件名。

trans-unit.source: When printing multiple copies of a document, <see langword="true" /> to print all pages of the document before printing the next copy.
trans-unit.target: 在打印多份文档时，如果为 <see langword="true" />，则先打印该文档的所有页，然后再打印下一份。

trans-unit.source: This argument is available only in Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.
trans-unit.target: 此参数只在 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本中可用。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about this argument, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.
trans-unit.target: 有关此参数的其他信息，请参阅 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本附带的语言参考帮助。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to print a two-sided document on a printer without a duplex printing kit.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在没有双面打印装置的打印机上打印双面文档。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is <see langword="true" />, the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintBackground" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintReverse" /> properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数为 <see langword="true" />，则忽略 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintBackground" /> 和 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintReverse" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintOddPagesInAscendingOrder" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintEvenPagesInAscendingOrder" /> properties to control the output during manual duplex printing.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintOddPagesInAscendingOrder" /> 和 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.PrintEvenPagesInAscendingOrder" /> 属性在手动进行双面打印时控制输出。

trans-unit.source: This argument might not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you selected or installed.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可能不能用，这取决于所选或安装的语言支持（例如，英语）。

trans-unit.source: The number of pages you want Word to fit horizontally on one page.
trans-unit.target: 希望 Word 在一页上水平布置的页数。

trans-unit.source: Can be 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Use with the <c>PrintZoomRow</c> argument to print multiple pages on a single sheet.
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>PrintZoomRow</c> 参数结合使用，用于在单张纸上打印多页。

trans-unit.source: The number of pages you want Word to fit vertically on one page.
trans-unit.target: 希望 Word 在一页上垂直布置的页数。

trans-unit.source: Can be 1, 2, or 4.
trans-unit.target: 可以是 1、2 或 4。

trans-unit.source: Use with the <c>PrintZoomColumn</c> argument to print multiple pages on a single sheet.
trans-unit.target: 与 <c>PrintZoomColumn</c> 参数结合使用，用于在单张纸上打印多页。

trans-unit.source: The width to which you want Word to scale printed pages, in twips (20 twips = 1 point; 72 points = 1 inch).
trans-unit.target: 希望 Word 将打印页缩放到的宽度（以缇表示，20 缇 = 1 磅，72 磅 = 1 英寸）。

trans-unit.source: The height to which you want Word to scale printed pages, in twips (20 twips = 1 point; 72 points = 1 inch).
trans-unit.target: 希望 Word 将打印页缩放到的高度（以缇表示，20 缇 = 1 磅，72 磅 = 1 英寸）。

trans-unit.source: Prints all or part of the document.
trans-unit.target: 打印文档的一部分或全部。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether PRINT field instructions (such as PostScript commands) in a document are to be printed on top of text and graphics when a PostScript printer is used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在使用 PostScript 打印机时，文档中的 PRINT 字段说明（如 PostScript 命令）是否打印到文本和图形的顶部。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if PRINT field instructions (such as PostScript commands) in a document are to be printed on top of text and graphics when a PostScript printer is used; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在使用 PostScript 打印机时，文档中的 PRINT 字段说明（如 PostScript 命令）将打印到文本和图形的顶部，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether postscript code is printed in a converted Microsoft Office Word for Macintosh document.
trans-unit.target: 此属性控制是否在转换后的 Microsoft Office Word Macintosh 文档打印 postscript 代码。

trans-unit.source: If the document contains no PRINT fields, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档包含未打印字段，则此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: Switches the view to print preview.
trans-unit.target: 将视图切换到打印预览。

trans-unit.source: In addition to using this method, you can set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PrintPreview%2A> property to `true` or `false` to switch to or from print preview, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用此方法，你可以设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.PrintPreview%2A>属性`true`或`false`可以切换到或打印预览中，从分别。

trans-unit.source: You can also change the view by setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View.Type%2A> property for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View> to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdViewType.wdPrintPreview>.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以更改视图，通过设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View.Type%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View>到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdViewType.wdPrintPreview>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether revision marks are printed with the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示修订标记是否随文档一起打印。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if revision marks are printed with the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> (tracked changes are printed as if they had been accepted).
trans-unit.target: 如果修订标记随文档一起打印，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />（修订会打印出来，就好像它们已被接受一样）。

trans-unit.source: The protection type for the specified document.
trans-unit.target: 指定的文档的保护类型。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to reset form fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则将窗体字段重置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to retain the current form field values if the document is protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在文档处于保护状态时，保留当前窗体字段值。

trans-unit.source: If <c>Type</c> is not <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyFormFields" />, the <c>NoReset</c> argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>Type</c> 不为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyFormFields" />，则忽略 <c>NoReset</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: The password required to remove protection from the document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除保护时所需的密码。

trans-unit.source: (See Remarks below.)
trans-unit.target: （请参见下面的备注。）

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to use Information Rights Management (IRM) when protecting the document from changes.
trans-unit.target: 指定在防止文档被更改时是否使用信息权限管理 (IRM)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether formatting restrictions are enforced in a protected document.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否在受保护文档中强制格式设置限制。

trans-unit.source: Applies one of several types of protection to the document.
trans-unit.target: 向文档应用几种保护类型中的一种。

trans-unit.source: When a document is protected, users can make only limited changes, such as adding annotations, making revisions, or completing a form.
trans-unit.target: 如果保护文档，则用户可以进行有限的更改，如添加批注、 进行修订，或者完成窗体。

trans-unit.source: If the document is already protected when you use this method, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果已受保护文档，在使用此方法时，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications.
trans-unit.target: 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the protection type for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的保护类型。

trans-unit.source: The returned protection type can be one of the following <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType" /> constants: <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyComments" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyFormFields" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyReading" />, <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyRevisions" />, or <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdNoProtection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回的保护类型可以是下列 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType" /> 常数之一：<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyComments" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyFormFields" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyReading" />、<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdAllowOnlyRevisions" /> 或 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdProtectionType.wdNoProtection" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting character position.
trans-unit.target: 字符的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The ending character position.
trans-unit.target: 字符的结束位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> by using the specified starting and ending character positions.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的起始和结束字符位置来返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" /> that uses the specified starting and ending character positions.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range" />，使用指定的起始和结束字符位置。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ReadabilityStatistics" /> collection that represents the readability statistics for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ReadabilityStatistics" /> 集合，该集合表示文档的可读性统计信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ReadabilityStatistics" /> collection that represents the readability statistics for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ReadabilityStatistics" /> 集合，表示文档的可读性统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of pages in the document when it is displayed in reading layout view and is frozen for entering handwritten markup.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当文档在阅读版式视图中显示且被冻结以输入手写标记时，文档中页的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width of pages in the document when it is displayed in reading layout view and is frozen for entering handwritten markup.
trans-unit.target: 当文档在阅读版式视图中显示且被冻结以输入手写标记时，文档中页的宽度。

trans-unit.source: After setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeX%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeY%2A> properties, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingModeLayoutFrozen%2A> property to display the page using the specified height and width.
trans-unit.target: 设置后<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeX%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeY%2A>属性，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingModeLayoutFrozen%2A>属性显示页面使用的指定的高度和宽度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View.ReadingLayout%2A> property to display a document in reading layout view.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View.ReadingLayout%2A>阅读版式视图中显示文档的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of pages in the document when it is displayed in reading layout view and is frozen for entering handwritten markup.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当文档在阅读版式视图中显示且被冻结以输入手写标记时，文档中页的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of pages in the document when it is displayed in reading layout view and is frozen for entering handwritten markup.
trans-unit.target: 当文档在阅读版式视图中显示且被冻结以输入手写标记时，文档中页的高度。

trans-unit.source: After setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeX%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeY%2A> properties, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingModeLayoutFrozen%2A> property to display the page using the specified height and width.
trans-unit.target: 设置后<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeX%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeY%2A>属性，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingModeLayoutFrozen%2A>属性显示页面使用的指定的高度和宽度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View.ReadingLayout%2A> property to display a document in reading layout view.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.View.ReadingLayout%2A>阅读版式视图中显示文档的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether pages displayed in reading layout view are frozen to a specified size for inserting handwritten markup into a document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示在阅读版式视图中显示的页面是否被冻结到指定的大小以便向文档中插入手写标记。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if pages displayed in reading layout view are frozen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在阅读版式视图中显示的页面被冻结，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeX%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeY%2A> properties to specify the size of the pages displayed when the reading layout size is frozen for inserting handwritten markup into a document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeX%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReadingLayoutSizeY%2A>属性以指定的页大小显示当正在读取的布局大小被冻结以将手写的标记插入到文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether changes to the document cannot be saved to the original document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示对文档进行的更改是否不能保存到原始文档中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if changes to the document cannot be saved to the original document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对文档进行的更改不能保存到原始文档中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word displays a message whenever a user opens the document, suggesting that the document be opened as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示在用户打开文档时 Microsoft Office Word 是否显示一条消息，指出文档只能以只读方式打开。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Word displays a message box whenever a user opens the document, suggesting that the document be opened as read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在用户打开文档时 Word 显示一个消息框，指出文档只能以只读方式打开，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of actions to be redone.
trans-unit.target: 要重复的操作的数目。

trans-unit.source: Performs the last action that was undone (reverses the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Undo(System.Object@)" /> method).
trans-unit.target: 执行已撤消的上一个操作（与 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Undo(System.Object@)" /> 方法相反）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the actions were redone successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作已成功重复，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Rejects all tracked changes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 拒绝文档中的所有修订。

trans-unit.source: Rejects all revisions in the document that are displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 拒绝文档中所有显示在屏幕上的修订。

trans-unit.source: Reloads a cached document by resolving the hyperlink to the document and downloading the document.
trans-unit.target: 通过解析缓存文档的超链接并下载该文档来重新加载它。

trans-unit.source: This method reloads the document asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 此方法以异步方式重新加载文档。

trans-unit.source: Statements following the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Reload%2A> method in your procedure might execute before the document is actually reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 语句以下<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Reload%2A>文档实际重新加载之前可能执行了在过程中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you might get unexpected results from using this method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你可能从使用此方法获取意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Reloads a document based on an HTML document, using the specified document encoding.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的文档编码，重新加载基于 HTML 文档的文档。

trans-unit.source: Removes the customization from the document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档移除自定义。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the customization by performing the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以通过执行以下任务来删除自定义项：

trans-unit.source: It deletes the `_AssemblyName` and `_AssemblyLocation` custom properties from the document.
trans-unit.target: 它将删除`_AssemblyName`和`_AssemblyLocation`从文档的自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Document Properties Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义文档属性概述](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-document-properties-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: It deletes the cached data from the document.
trans-unit.target: 它从文档中删除缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information about cached data, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关缓存数据的详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method might throw an <xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException> if the document is protected.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能引发<xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException>如果受保护文档。

trans-unit.source: You should remove any protection from the document before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 应调用此方法之前从文档中删除任何保护。

trans-unit.source: The custom document properties or the cached data could not be removed from the document.
trans-unit.target: 无法从文档移除自定义文档属性或缓存数据。

trans-unit.source: The document is protected.
trans-unit.target: 文档是受保护的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a document stores the date and time metadata for tracked changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示文档是否存储修订的日期和时间元数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document removes date and time stamp information from tracked changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档从修订中移除日期和时间戳信息，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use in conjunction with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.RemovePersonalInformation%2A> property to help remove personal information from the document properties.
trans-unit.target: 结合使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.RemovePersonalInformation%2A>属性，以帮助从文档属性中删除个人信息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdRemoveDocInfoType" /> values that specifies what information to remove.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdRemoveDocInfoType" /> 值之一，指定要移除的信息。

trans-unit.source: Removes metadata, such as properties and comments, from a document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除元数据（如属性和注释）。

trans-unit.source: Purges a document of locked styles when formatting restrictions have been applied in a document.
trans-unit.target: 在向文档应用了格式设置限制时清除锁定样式的文档。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdNumberType" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of number to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的编号的类型。

trans-unit.source: Removes numbers or bullets from the document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除编号或项目符号。

trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word removes all user information from comments, revisions, and the **Properties** dialog box when the user saves the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示在用户保存文档时，Microsoft Office Word 是否从注释、修订和“属性”对话框中移除所有用户信息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word removes all user information from comments, revisions, and the **Properties** dialog box when the document is saved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果注释，修订，从 Microsoft Office Word 中删除的所有用户信息和**属性**对话框中的文档时保存; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the active theme from the document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除活动主题。

trans-unit.source: Repaginates the entire document.
trans-unit.target: 重标整个文档的页码。

trans-unit.source: Opens a new e-mail message for replying to the active message.
trans-unit.target: 打开新电子邮件以答复活动消息。

trans-unit.source: The sender's address is included on the To: line.
trans-unit.target: 发件人的地址包含在“到:”行中。

trans-unit.source: Opens a new e-mail message for replying to the active message.
trans-unit.target: 打开新电子邮件以答复活动消息。

trans-unit.source: The sender’s address and all other recipients' addresses are included on the To: and Cc: lines as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 发件人的地址和所有其他收件人的地址根据相应的情况包含在“到:”和“抄送:”行中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the message prior to sending.
trans-unit.target: 如果在发送之前显示消息，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to automatically send the message without displaying it first.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则自动发送消息，而不首先显示消息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends an e-mail message to the author of a document that has been sent out for review, notifying him or her that a reviewer has completed review of the document.
trans-unit.target: 将电子邮件发送给已发出进行审阅的文档的作者，向作者通知审阅者已完成对该文档的审阅。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SendForReview%2A> method to start a collaborative review of a document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SendForReview%2A>方法以启动文档协作审阅。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReplyWithChanges%2A> method is executed on a document that is not part of a collaborative review cycle, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.ReplyWithChanges%2A>方法执行不协作审阅循环的一部分的文档，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the research service for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的信息检索服务。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Research" /> object that represents the research service for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Research" /> 对象，表示文档的信息检索服务。

trans-unit.source: Clears all form fields in a document, preparing the form to be filled in again.
trans-unit.target: 清除文档中的所有窗体字段，并准备再次填写窗体。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to clear fields when a document's fields are not locked.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法以在文档的字段不处于锁定状态时清除字段。

trans-unit.source: To clear fields when a document's fields are locked, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Protect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要在文档字段处于锁定状态时，请清除字段，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Protect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the title of the revised document after performing a legal-blackline document compare operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取执行显示更改的文档比较操作后的修订文档的标题。

trans-unit.source: The title of the revised document after performing a legal-blackline document compare operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行显示更改的文档比较操作后的修订文档的标题。

trans-unit.source: To perform a legal-blackline document compare operation, use the `CompareDocuments` method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Application%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行精确比较文档的比较操作，使用`CompareDocuments`方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Application%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Revisions" /> collection that represents the tracked changes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Revisions" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的修订。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Revisions" /> collection that represents the tracked changes in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Revisions" /> 集合，表示文档中的修订。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoMacros" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdAutoMacros" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Runs an auto macro that is stored in the document.
trans-unit.target: 运行存储在文档中的自动宏。

trans-unit.source: If the specified auto macro does not exist, nothing happens.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的自动宏不存在，不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" />。

trans-unit.source: Any filled properties in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" /> show up as filled elements in the **Letter Wizard** dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" /> 中所有已填充的属性都显示为“英文信函向导”对话框中的已填充元素。

trans-unit.source: If this argument is omitted, the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GetLetterContent" /> method is automatically used to get a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" /> from the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略此参数，则自动使用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GetLetterContent" /> 方法从文档获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the **Letter Wizard** dialog box as a series of steps with **Next**, **Back**, and **Finish** buttons.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将“英文信函向导”对话框显示为带有“下一步”、“上一步”和“完成”按钮的一系列步骤。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to display the **Letter Wizard** dialog box as if it were opened from the **Tools** menu (a properties dialog box with an **OK** button and a **Cancel** button).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则按照“英文信函向导”对话框从“工具”菜单中打开的方式来显示该对话框，即显示为一个带有“确定”和“取消”按钮的属性对话框。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Runs the **Letter Wizard** on the document.
trans-unit.target: 在文档中运行“英文信函向导”。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.CreateLetterContent%2A> method to return a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent> with various letter element properties specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.CreateLetterContent%2A>方法以返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent>的各种字母元素属性指定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GetLetterContent%2A> method to return a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent> based on the contents of the document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.GetLetterContent%2A>方法以返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent>基于文档的内容。

trans-unit.source: You can use the resulting <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent> with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.RunLetterWizard%2A> method to set elements in the **Letter Wizard** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用生成<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent>与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.RunLetterWizard%2A>方法以设置的元素**字母向导**对话框。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Saves the document.
trans-unit.target: 保存文档。

trans-unit.source: If the document has not been saved before, the **Save As** dialog box prompts the user for a file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档在以前没有保存过，“另存为”对话框会提示用户输入一个文件名。

trans-unit.source: The name for the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current folder and file name.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是当前文件夹名和文件名。

trans-unit.source: If the document has never been saved, the default name is used (for example, Doc1.doc).
trans-unit.target: 如果文档在以前没有保存过，则使用默认名称（例如，Doc1.doc）。

trans-unit.source: If a document with the specified file name already exists, the document is overwritten without the user being prompted first.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经存在具有指定文件名的文档，则会在不先提示用户的情况下覆盖文档。

trans-unit.source: The format in which the document is saved.
trans-unit.target: 文档的保存格式。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: To save a document in another format, specify the appropriate value for the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SaveFormat" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要以另一种格式保存文档，请为 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SaveFormat" /> 属性指定适当的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to lock the document for comments.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则锁定文档以进行注释。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A password string for opening the document.
trans-unit.target: 用来打开文档的密码字符串。

trans-unit.source: (See Remarks below.)
trans-unit.target: （请参见下面的备注。）

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add the document to the list of recently used files on the **File** menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将该文档添加到“文件”菜单上最近使用的文件列表中。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A password string for saving changes to the document.
trans-unit.target: 用来保存对文件所做更改的密码字符串。

trans-unit.source: (See Remarks below.)
trans-unit.target: （请参见下面的备注。）

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to have Microsoft Office Word suggest read-only status whenever the document is opened.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则让 Microsoft Office Word 在打开文档时建议只读状态。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to save TrueType fonts with the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将 TrueType 字体随文档一起保存。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, the <c>EmbedTrueTypeFonts</c> argument assumes the value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.EmbedTrueTypeFonts" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略，则 <c>EmbedTrueTypeFonts</c> 参数假定 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.EmbedTrueTypeFonts" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If graphics were imported from another platform (for example, Macintosh), <see langword="true" /> to save only the Windows version of the imported graphics.
trans-unit.target: 如果图形是从另一个平台（例如，Macintosh）导入的，则 <see langword="true" /> 表示仅保存导入图形的 Windows 版本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to save the data entered by a user in a form as a data record.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将用户在窗体中输入的数据另存为数据记录。

trans-unit.source: If the document has an attached mailer, <see langword="true" /> to save the document as an AOCE letter (the mailer is saved).
trans-unit.target: 如果文档附加了邮件程序，则 <see langword="true" /> 表示会将文档另存为 AOCE 信函（邮件程序会进行保存）。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" />。

trans-unit.source: The code page, or character set, to use for documents saved as encoded text files.
trans-unit.target: 要用于另存为编码文本文件的文档的代码页或字符集。

trans-unit.source: The default is the system code page.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是系统代码页。

trans-unit.source: If the document is saved as a text file, <see langword="true" /> to insert line breaks at the end of each line of text.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档另存为文本文件，则 <see langword="true" /> 表示在每行文本末尾插入分行符。

trans-unit.source: If the document is saved as a text file, <see langword="true" /> allows Word to replace some symbols with text that looks similar.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档另存为文本文件，则 <see langword="true" /> 允许 Word 将某些符号替换为外观与之类似的文本。

trans-unit.source: For example, displaying the copyright symbol as (c).
trans-unit.target: 例如，将版权符号显示为 (c)。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The way Word marks the line and paragraph breaks in documents saved as text files.
trans-unit.target: Word 在另存为文本文件的文档中标记分行符和换段符。

trans-unit.source: Can be any <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineEndingType" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineEndingType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> adds control characters to the output file to preserve bi-directional layout of the text in the original document.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则向输出文件添加控制字符，以便保留原始文档中文本的双向布局。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompatibilityMode" /> values that specifies the compatibility mode that [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] uses when opening the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompatibilityMode" /> 值，指定在打开文档时 [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 使用的兼容性模式。

trans-unit.source: Saves the document with a new name or format.
trans-unit.target: 用新名称或新格式保存文档。

trans-unit.source: Some of the arguments for this method correspond to the options in the **Save As** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的某些参数与“另存为”对话框中的选项相对应。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications.
trans-unit.target: 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method is used in a Word 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The full path of the quick style set file.
trans-unit.target: 快速样式集文件的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Saves the group of quick styles currently in use.
trans-unit.target: 保存当前使用的快速样式组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the document has not changed since it was last saved.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示文档自上次保存以来是否未进行过更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document has not changed since it was last saved; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档自上次保存以来未进行过更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: (If <see langword="false" />, Microsoft Office Word displays a prompt to save changes when the document is closed.)
trans-unit.target: （如果为 <see langword="false" />，Microsoft Office Word 将在文档关闭时显示一个保存更改的提示。）

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding to use when saving the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在保存文档时使用的编码。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets the file format of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: The file format of the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档的文件格式。

trans-unit.source: The value is a unique number that specifies an external file converter or a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat> constant.
trans-unit.target: 值是唯一的编号，指定外部文件转换器或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat>常量。

trans-unit.source: Use the value of this property for the `FileFormat` argument of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SaveAs%2A> method to save a document in a file format for which there is not a corresponding <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat> constant.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性的值`FileFormat`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SaveAs%2A>方法以将文档保存为其存在是不对应的文件格式<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdSaveFormat>常量。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word saves the data entered in a form as a tab-delimited record for use in a database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否将在窗体中输入的数据保存为 tab 分隔的记录以在数据库中使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word saves the data entered in a form as a tab-delimited record for use in a database; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 将在窗体中输入的数据保存为 tab 分隔的记录以在数据库中使用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word saves a subset of the embedded TrueType fonts with the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否将嵌入的 TrueType 字体的子集随文档一起保存。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word saves a subset of the embedded TrueType fonts with the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 将嵌入的 TrueType 字体的子集随文档一起保存，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If fewer than 32 characters of a TrueType font are used in a document, Word embeds the subset (only the characters used) in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果在文档中使用的 TrueType 字体少于 32 个字符，Word 将文档中嵌入的子集 （仅使用的字符）。

trans-unit.source: If more than 32 characters are used, Word embeds the entire font.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了 32 个以上字符，Word 会嵌入整个字体。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Scripts" /> collection that represents the collection of HTML scripts in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Scripts" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中 HTML 脚本的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Scripts" /> collection that represents the collection of HTML scripts in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Scripts" /> 集合，表示文档中 HTML 脚本的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sections" /> collection that represents the sections in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sections" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的节。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sections" /> collection that represents the sections in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sections" /> 集合，表示文档中的节。

trans-unit.source: Selects the document.
trans-unit.target: 选择文档。

trans-unit.source: After using this method, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.Selection%2A> property to work with the document.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法后，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Application.Selection%2A>属性以使用该文档。

trans-unit.source: Can be the user's e-mail alias (if in the same domain), an e-mail address, or a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEditorType" /> constant that represents a group of users.
trans-unit.target: 可以是用户的电子邮件别名（如果在同一个域中）、电子邮件地址或表示用户组的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdEditorType" /> 常数。

trans-unit.source: The default is that only ranges for which all users have permissions are selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认设置是仅选择所有用户对其拥有权限的范围。

trans-unit.source: Selects all ranges that the specified user or group of users has permission to modify.
trans-unit.target: 选择指定的用户或用户组对其拥有修改权限的全部范围。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The tag of the content controls to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的内容控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the content controls in the document that have the specified tag.
trans-unit.target: 返回文档中具有指定标记的所有内容控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> collection that contains the content controls that have the specified tag.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> 集合，包含文档中具有指定标记的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: The title of the content controls to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的内容控件的标题。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the content controls in the document that have the specified title.
trans-unit.target: 返回文档中具有指定标题的所有内容控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> collection that contains the content controls that have the specified title.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> 集合，包含文档中具有指定标题的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selection changes in the document window.
trans-unit.target: 在文档窗口中的选定内容发生更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays a message that indicates that the selection has changed whenever you change the selection within the document.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示一条消息，指示所选内容已更改，每当你更改所选内容的文档中。

trans-unit.source: This example is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLNode" /> to which the content controls are linked.
trans-unit.target: 内容控件链接到的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLNode" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the content controls in the document that are linked to the specified custom XML node.
trans-unit.target: 返回文档中链接到指定自定义 XML 节点的所有内容控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> collection that contains the content controls that are linked to the specified custom XML node.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> 集合，包含链接到指定自定义 XML 节点的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: A valid XPath string.
trans-unit.target: 有效的 XPath 字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information on XPath, see XPath Reference.
trans-unit.target: 关于 XPath 的更多信息，请参见 XPath 参考。

trans-unit.source: Provides the prefix in the schema against which to perform the search.
trans-unit.target: 提供架构中用作搜索依据的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <c>PrefixMapping</c> parameter if your <c>XPath</c> parameter uses names to search for elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>XPath</c> 参数使用名称搜索元素，请使用 <c>PrefixMapping</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> skips all text nodes while searching for the specified node.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在搜索指定的节点时忽略所有文本节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> includes text nodes in the search.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则在搜索中包含文本节点。

trans-unit.source: Default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents all the nodes that match the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter in the order in which they appear in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，该集合表示按照节点在文档中出现的顺序与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents all the nodes that match the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter in the order in which they appear in the document; <see langword="null" /> if no nodes matching the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter are found.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，该集合表示按照节点在文档中出现的顺序与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的所有节点；如果未找到与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的节点，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `FastSearchSkippingTextNodes` parameter to `true` diminishes performance, because Microsoft Office Word searches all nodes in a document against the text contained in the node.
trans-unit.target: 设置`FastSearchSkippingTextNodes`参数`true`会降低性能，因为 Microsoft Office Word 搜索对节点中包含的文本文档中的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: A valid XPath string.
trans-unit.target: 有效的 XPath 字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information about XPath, see XPath Reference.
trans-unit.target: 关于 XPath 的更多信息，请参见 XPath 参考。

trans-unit.source: Provides the prefix in the schema against which to perform the search.
trans-unit.target: 提供架构中用作搜索依据的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <c>PrefixMapping</c> parameter if your <c>XPath</c> parameter uses names to search for elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>XPath</c> 参数使用名称搜索元素，请使用 <c>PrefixMapping</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> skips all text nodes while searching for the specified node.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在搜索指定的节点时忽略所有文本节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> includes text nodes in the search.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则在搜索中包含文本节点。

trans-unit.source: Default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> object that represents the first node in the document that matches the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象，该对象表示文档中与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的第一个节点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> object that represents the first node that matches the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter in the document; <see langword="null" /> if no nodes matching the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter are found.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象，该对象表示文档中与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的第一个节点；如果未找到与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的节点，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `FastSearchSkippingTextNodes` parameter to `true` diminishes performance because Microsoft Office Word searches all nodes in a document against the text contained in the node.
trans-unit.target: 设置`FastSearchSkippingTextNodes`参数`true`会降低性能，因为 Microsoft Office Word 搜索对节点中包含的文本文档中的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart" /> that is used to filter the content controls you want to get in the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart" /> 用于筛选想要从文档中获取的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a value for this parameter, this method returns only the content controls that referencethis<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart" /> in their <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControl.XMLMapping" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果为参数指定值，则此方法只返回在其 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControl.XMLMapping" /> 属性中引用此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomXMLPart" /> 的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the content controls in the document that are not linked to a custom XML part.
trans-unit.target: 返回文档中所有内容控件（未链接到自定义 XML 部件）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> collection that contains the content controls in the document that are not linked to a custom XML part.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ContentControls" /> 集合，它包含文档中的内容控件（未链接到自定义 XML 部件）。

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The recipient's fax number.
trans-unit.target: 收件人的传真号。

trans-unit.source: The text for the subject line.
trans-unit.target: 主题行的文本。

trans-unit.source: The character limit is 255.
trans-unit.target: 字符限制是 255。

trans-unit.source: Sends the document as a fax, without any user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 以传真形式发送文档，无需用户交互。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The fax numbers and e-mail addresses of the people to whom to send the fax.
trans-unit.target: 传真接收人员的传真号和电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Separate multiple recipients with a semicolon.
trans-unit.target: 用分号分隔多个收件人。

trans-unit.source: The subject line for the faxed document.
trans-unit.target: 传真文档的主题行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the fax message before sending it.
trans-unit.target: 如果在发送之前显示传真邮件，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to send the fax without displaying the fax message.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则发送传真邮件时不显示该邮件。

trans-unit.source: Sends the document to a fax service provider, who faxes the document to one or more specified recipients.
trans-unit.target: 将文档发送给传真服务提供程序，该提供程序会将文档传真给指定的一个或多个收件人。

trans-unit.source: Using this method requires that a fax service is enabled on a user's computer.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法需要用户的计算机上启用了传真服务。

trans-unit.source: If a fax service is not enabled, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SendFaxOverInternet%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果传真服务未启用，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SendFaxOverInternet%2A>方法引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The format used for specifying fax numbers in the `Recipients` parameter is either *recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider* or *recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber*.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定中的传真号码的格式`Recipients`参数可以是* recipientsfaxnumber@usersfaxprovider *或* recipientsname@recipientsfaxnumber *。

trans-unit.source: You can access the user's fax provider information using the following registry path:
trans-unit.target: 您可以访问用户的传真提供程序信息使用以下注册表路径：

trans-unit.source: Use the `FaxAddress` key value at this registry location to determine the format to use for a user.
trans-unit.target: 使用`FaxAddress`键值在此注册表位置来确定要使用用户的格式。

trans-unit.source: If this registry entry does not exist, no fax service is available.
trans-unit.target: 如果此注册表项不存在，则传真服务不可用。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The people to whom to send the message.
trans-unit.target: 邮件收件人。

trans-unit.source: These can be unresolved names and aliases in an e-mail phone book or full e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: 这些收件人可以是电子邮件电话簿中未解析的名称和别名，或完整的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Separate multiple recipients with a semicolon (;).
trans-unit.target: 用分号 (;) 分隔多个收件人。

trans-unit.source: If left blank and <c>ShowMessage</c> is <see langword="false" />, an exception is thrown and the message is not sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果留为空白，而且 <c>ShowMessage</c> 为 <see langword="false" />，则引发异常，因而不发送消息。

trans-unit.source: The subject of the message.
trans-unit.target: 邮件的主题。

trans-unit.source: If left blank, the subject will be: Please review "<c>filename</c>".
trans-unit.target: 如果留为空白，则主题将为：请查看“<c>filename</c>”。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the message before sending; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在发送之前显示消息，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If set to <see langword="false" />, the message is automatically sent to the recipients without first showing the message to the sender.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 <see langword="false" />，则邮件会自动发送给收件人，而不首先向发件人显示邮件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include the document as an attachment; <see langword="false" /> to send a link to the document at a server location.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将文档包括为附件；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则发送指向服务器位置上的文档的链接。

trans-unit.source: If set to <see langword="false" />, the document must be stored at a shared location.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 <see langword="false" />，则必须将文档存储在共享位置。

trans-unit.source: Sends the document in an e-mail message for review by the specified recipients.
trans-unit.target: 以电子邮件形式发送文档，以便供指定的收件人审阅。

trans-unit.source: This method starts a collaborative review cycle.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会启动协作审阅周期。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.EndReview%2A> method to end a review cycle.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.EndReview%2A>方法来结束审阅循环。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Opens a message window for sending the document through Microsoft Exchange.
trans-unit.target: 打开一个消息窗口，以便通过 Microsoft Exchange 发送文档。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.SendMailAttach%2A> property to control whether the document is sent as text in the message window or as an attachment.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.SendMailAttach%2A>属性控制是否将为电子邮件窗口中的文本或作为附件发送文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sentences" /> collection that represents all the sentences in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sentences" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有句子。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sentences" /> collection that represents all the sentences in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Sentences" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有句子。

trans-unit.source: Gets the policy that is specified for the document, when the document is stored on a server that is running Microsoft Office SharePoint Server.
trans-unit.target: 获取为存储在运行 Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 的服务器上的文档指定的策略。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.ServerPolicy" /> object that represents the policy that is specified for the document, when the document is stored on a server that is running Microsoft Office SharePoint Server.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.ServerPolicy" /> 对象，表示为存储在运行 Microsoft Office SharePoint Server 的服务器上的文档指定的策略。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompatibilityMode" /> values that specifies the compatibility mode that [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] uses when opening the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdCompatibilityMode" /> 值，指定在打开文档时 [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 使用的兼容性模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the compatibility mode for the document.
trans-unit.target: 设置文档的兼容性模式。

trans-unit.source: When you open a document in [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] that was created in a previous version of Word, Compatibility Mode is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 中打开使用早期版本的 Word 创建的文档时，兼容性模式将打开。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility Mode ensures that no new or enhanced features in [!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] are available while working with a document, so that people who edit the document using previous versions of Word will have full editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 兼容性模式可确保在处理文档时，[!INCLUDE[Word_15_short](~/includes/word-15-short-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[Word_14_short](~/includes/word-14-short-md.md)] 中没有新增或增强功能可用，以便使用早期版本的 Word 编辑文档的用户获得完全编辑功能。

trans-unit.source: This method appears in IntelliSense in Word 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法将显示在 IntelliSense Word 2007 项目中面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: However, this property cannot be used in Word 2007 projects.
trans-unit.target: 但是，无法在 Word 2007 项目中使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is used in a Word 2007 project.
trans-unit.target: 在 Word 2007 项目中使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the style.
trans-unit.target: 样式的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to save the table style in the template attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在附加到文档的模板中保存表样式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the table style to use for newly created tables in the document.
trans-unit.target: 指定要用于文档中新创建的表的表样式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" /> that includes the various elements of the letter.
trans-unit.target: 包含各种信函元素的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the contents of the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" /> into the document.
trans-unit.target: 将指定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent" /> 的内容插入文档中。

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.RunLetterWizard%2A> method except that it does not display the **Letter Wizard** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此方法类似于是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.RunLetterWizard%2A>方法，但它不会显示**字母向导**对话框。
