trans-unit.source: The method adds, deletes, or restyles letter elements in the document based on the contents of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent> object.
trans-unit.target: 该方法添加、 删除信函元素或改变基于内容的文档中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.LetterContent>对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the encryption provider.
trans-unit.target: 加密提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 加密算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Word supports stream-encrypted algorithms.
trans-unit.target: Word 支持流加密算法。

trans-unit.source: The encryption key length.
trans-unit.target: 加密密钥的长度。

trans-unit.source: Must be a multiple of 8, starting at 40.
trans-unit.target: 必须是 8 的倍数，从 40 开始。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> for Word to encrypt file properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，Word 将加密文件属性。

trans-unit.source: Default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the options Microsoft Office Word uses for encrypting documents with passwords.
trans-unit.target: 设置 Microsoft Office Word 在用密码对文档加密时使用的选项。

trans-unit.source: For enhanced security, do not use Weak Encryption (XOR) (also called "OfficeXor") or "Office97/2000 Compatible" (also called "OfficeStandard") algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 为了增强安全性，不要使用弱加密 (XOR) （也称为"OfficeXor"） 或"Office97/2000年兼容"（也称为"OfficeStandard"） 的算法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shapes" /> collection that represents all the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> objects in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shapes" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shapes" /> collection that represents all the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> objects in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shapes" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This collection can contain drawings, shapes, pictures, OLE objects, ActiveX controls, text objects, and callouts.
trans-unit.target: 此集合可以包含绘图、 形状、 图片、 OLE 对象、 ActiveX 控件、 文本对象和标注。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Shapes%2A> property, when applied to a document, returns all the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape> objects in the main story of the document, excluding the headers and footers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Shapes%2A>属性，当应用于一个文档，返回所有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape>文档，不包括页眉和页脚的正文中的对象。

trans-unit.source: When applied to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.HeaderFooter> object, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Shapes%2A> property returns all the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape> objects found in all the headers and footers in the document.
trans-unit.target: 当应用于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.HeaderFooter>对象，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Shapes%2A>属性返回所有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape>所有标头和文档的页脚中找到对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether grammatical errors are marked by a wavy green line in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否在文档中用绿色波浪线标记语法错误。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if grammatical errors are marked by a wavy green line in the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在文档中用绿色波浪线标记语法错误，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To view grammatical errors in your document, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.CheckGrammarAsYouType%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看你的文档中的语法错误，必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.CheckGrammarAsYouType%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether tracked changes in the document are shown on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否在屏幕上显示文档中的修订。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if tracked changes in the document are shown on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在屏幕上显示文档中的修订，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word underlines spelling errors in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否用下划线标出文档中的拼写错误。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word underlines spelling errors in the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 用下划线标出文档中的拼写错误，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To view spelling errors in a document, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.CheckSpellingAsYouType%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看在文档中的拼写错误，必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.CheckSpellingAsYouType%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the document host item shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 在文档宿主项关闭时发生。

trans-unit.source: This is the last event to be called in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document> as it unloads.
trans-unit.target: 这是要在中调用的最后一个事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document>万不得已。

trans-unit.source: Use this event for any additional clean up.
trans-unit.target: 此事件用于任何其他清理过程。

trans-unit.source: In a document-level customization, the application domain for the assembly unloads when the document host item shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 文档级自定义项，文档主机项关闭时，将卸载程序集的应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: In an application-level add-in, the application domain does not unload when the document host item shuts down.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序级外接程序，文档主机项关闭时，不会不卸载应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: Also, the underlying document object is no more available.
trans-unit.target: 此外，基础文档对象将不再可用。

trans-unit.source: To access the document before it shuts down use <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.CloseEvent> instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要关闭使用之前访问文档<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.CloseEvent>相反。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.SignatureSet" /> that represents the digital signatures for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示文档数字签名的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.SignatureSet" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.SignatureSet" /> that represents the digital signatures for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示文档数字签名的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.SignatureSet" />。

trans-unit.source: To digitally sign Microsoft Office Word documents and verify other signatures in them, you need the Microsoft CryptoAPI and a unique digital signature certificate.
trans-unit.target: 若要进行数字签名 Microsoft Office Word 文档和验证其他中它们的签名，你需要 Microsoft CryptoAPI 和唯一的数字签名证书。

trans-unit.source: The CryptoAPI is installed with Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.01 and higher.
trans-unit.target: CryptoAPI 是使用 Microsoft Internet 资源管理器 4.01 安装和更高版本。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a digital signature certificate from a certification authority.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从证书颁发机构获取数字签名证书。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.SmartDocument" /> that represents the settings for a smart document solution.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示智能文档解决方案的设置的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.SmartDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.SmartDocument" /> that represents the settings for a smart document solution.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.SmartDocument" />，表示智能文档解决方案的设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information on smart documents, see the Smart Document Software Development Kit on the Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 智能文档的详细信息，请参阅 Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) 网站上的智能文档软件开发工具包。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether AutoShapes or East Asian characters are automatically aligned with an invisible grid when they are drawn, moved, or resized in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示在对文档中的自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动或大小调整时，是否让它们与不可见网格自动对齐。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if AutoShapes or East Asian characters are automatically aligned with an invisible grid when they are drawn, moved, or resized in the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在对文档中的自选图形或东亚字符进行绘制、移动或大小调整时，让它们与不可见网格自动对齐，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can temporarily override this setting by pressing ALT while drawing, moving, or resizing an AutoShape.
trans-unit.target: 你可以绘制、 移动或重设大小自选，按下 ALT 暂时重写此设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word automatically aligns AutoShapes or East Asian characters with invisible gridlines that go through the vertical and horizontal edges of other AutoShapes or East Asian characters in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是否将自选图形或东亚字符自动与通过文档中其他自选图形或东亚字符的垂直和水平边缘的不可见网格线对齐。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Microsoft Office Word automatically aligns AutoShapes or East Asian characters; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 自动对齐自选图形或东亚字符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property creates additional invisible gridlines for each AutoShape.
trans-unit.target: 此属性为每个自选图形创建其他不可见的网格线。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SnapToShapes%2A> works independently of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SnapToGrid%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SnapToShapes%2A> 独立于适用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SnapToGrid%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether spelling has been checked throughout the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否已通查文档中的拼写。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if spelling has been checked throughout the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已通查文档中的拼写，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To recheck the spelling in the document, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SpellingChecked%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要重新检查文档中的拼写，设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SpellingChecked%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: To see whether the document contains spelling errors, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SpellingErrors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看该文档是否包含拼写错误，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.SpellingErrors%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> collection that represents the words identified as spelling errors in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中标识为拼写错误的单词。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" /> collection that represents the words identified as spelling errors in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个集合 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ProofreadingErrors" />，表示文档中标识为拼写错误的单词。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the document is running and all the initialization code in the assembly has been run.
trans-unit.target: 在文档正在运行并且该程序集中的所有初始化代码都已运行之后发生。

trans-unit.source: In document-level projects, you should use the existing <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Startup> event handler in your project, rather than creating a new one.
trans-unit.target: 在文档级项目中，你应使用现有<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Startup>在你的项目，而不是创建一个新的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.StoryRanges" /> collection that represents all the stories in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.StoryRanges" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.StoryRanges" /> collection that represents all the stories in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.StoryRanges" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Styles" /> collection for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Styles" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Styles" /> collection for the document.
trans-unit.target: 文档的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Styles" /> 集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.StyleSheets" /> object that represents the Web style sheets attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.StyleSheets" /> 对象，该对象表示附加到文档的 Web 样式表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.StyleSheets" /> object that represents the Web style sheets attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.StyleSheets" /> 对象，表示附加到文档的 Web 样式表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the sort method to use when sorting styles in the **Styles** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在对“样式”任务窗格中的样式进行排序时使用的排序方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdStyleSort" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdStyleSort" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Subdocuments" /> collection that represents all the subdocuments in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Subdocuments" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有子文档。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Subdocuments" /> collection that represents all the subdocuments in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Subdocuments" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有子文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Sync" /> object that provides access to the methods and properties of documents that are part of a Document Workspace.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Sync" /> 对象，该对象提供对属于文档工作区的文档的方法和属性的访问。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Sync" /> object that provides access to the methods and properties of documents that are part of a Document Workspace.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.Sync" /> 对象，提供对属于文档工作区的文档的方法和属性的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the local copy of a document that is part of a Document Workspace is synchronized with the copy on the server.
trans-unit.target: 在属于文档工作区的文档的本地副本与服务器上的副本同步时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Tables" /> collection that represents all the tables in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Tables" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Tables" /> collection that represents all the tables in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Tables" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfAuthorities" /> collection that represents the tables of authorities in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfAuthorities" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中颁发机构的表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfAuthorities" /> collection that represents the tables of authorities in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfAuthorities" /> 集合，表示文档中颁发机构的表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfAuthoritiesCategories" /> collection that represents the available table of authorities categories for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfAuthoritiesCategories" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中颁发机构类别的可用表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfAuthoritiesCategories" /> collection that represents the available table of authorities categories for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfAuthoritiesCategories" /> 集合，表示文档中颁发机构类别的可用表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfContents" /> collection that represents the tables of contents in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfContents" /> 集合，该集合表示文档的目录。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfContents" /> collection that represents the tables of contents in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfContents" /> 集合，表示文档的目录。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfFigures" /> collection that represents the tables of figures in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfFigures" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中图形的表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfFigures" /> collection that represents the tables of figures in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TablesOfFigures" /> 集合，表示文档中图形的表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data you want to save with the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象包含要随文档保存的数据。

trans-unit.source: A object that contains data you want to save with the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，包含要随文档保存的数据。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Tag%2A> property to store data that is closely associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.Tag%2A>属性来存储密切与文档相关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the code page, or character set, that Microsoft Office Word uses for a document saved as an encoded text file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Microsoft Office Word 在另存为编码文本文件的文档中使用的代码页或字符集。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoEncoding" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: This property sets text encoding separately from HTML encoding, which you can set using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions.Encoding%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置文本编码单独从 HTML 编码，可以使用设置此<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions.Encoding%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can get the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions> object from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WebOptions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions>对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WebOptions%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To set text encoding for all documents saved as text files, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DefaultTextEncoding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置文本编码的所有文档另存为文本文件，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Options.DefaultTextEncoding%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineEndingType" /> constant indicating how Microsoft Office Word marks the line and paragraph breaks in documents saved as text files.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineEndingType" /> 常数，该常数指示 Microsoft Office Word 如何在另存为文本文件的文档中标记分行符和换段符。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineEndingType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdLineEndingType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Switches form design mode on or off.
trans-unit.target: 打开或关闭窗体设计模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to track formatting changes when change tracking is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更改跟踪打开时是否跟踪格式设置更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to track formatting changes when change tracking is turned on; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在更改跟踪打开时要跟踪格式设置更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to mark moved text when change tracking is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更改跟踪打开时是否标记移动的文本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to mark moved text when change tracking is turned on; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在更改跟踪打开时要标记移动的文本，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, when change tracking is turned on, moved text is marked as deleted and inserted.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，启用更改跟踪后，移动的文本标记为已删除和插入。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.TrackMoves%2A> property is `true`, moved text is marked as moved, and the text in the original location is marked with strikethrough formatting.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.TrackMoves%2A>属性是`true`、 移动的文本标记为已移动，并且在原始位置的文本是带有删除线格式。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the **Track Moves** check box in the **Track Change Options** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于**跟踪移动**中的复选框**跟踪更改选项**对话框。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether changes are tracked in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否跟踪文档中的更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if changes are tracked in the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果跟踪文档中的更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The path of the XSLT file.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> applies the transformation only to the data in the document, excluding Microsoft Office Word XML.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则仅向文档中的数据（不包括 Microsoft Office Word XML）应用转换。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> applies the transform to the entire document, including Word XML.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则向整个文档（包括 Word XML）应用转换。

trans-unit.source: Default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the specified Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) file to the document and replaces the document with the results.
trans-unit.target: 向文档应用指定的可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 文件，并用结果替换文档。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the document type (template or document).
trans-unit.target: 获取文档类型（模板或文档）。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDocumentType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdDocumentType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The number of actions to be undone.
trans-unit.target: 要撤消的操作的数目。

trans-unit.source: The default is to undo the last action.
trans-unit.target: 默认设置是撤消上一个操作。

trans-unit.source: Undoes the last action or a sequence of actions, which are displayed in the **Undo** list.
trans-unit.target: 撤消上一个操作或者一系列操作，这些操作显示在“撤消”列表中。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the actions were successfully undone.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作已成功撤消，则返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the actions were successfully undone.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作已成功撤消，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Clears the list of actions that can be undone for the document.
trans-unit.target: 清除可对该文档撤消的操作的列表。

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the list of items that appears when you click the arrow beside the **Undo** button on the Quick Access Toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 与在单击快速访问工具栏上“撤消”按钮旁边的箭头时出现的项列表相对应。

trans-unit.source: Include this method after a method in your code to keep Word object model actions from appearing in the **Undo** box.
trans-unit.target: 将此方法包含在你的代码，以防出现在中的 Word 对象模型操作中的方法后**撤消**框。

trans-unit.source: The password used to protect the document.
trans-unit.target: 要用来保护文档的密码。

trans-unit.source: Passwords are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 密码区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the document is protected with a password and the correct password is not supplied, a dialog box prompts the user for the password.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档受密码保护而且用户没有提供正确的密码，则会显示一个对话框，提示用户输入正确的密码。

trans-unit.source: Removes protection from the document.
trans-unit.target: 从文档中移除保护功能。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications.
trans-unit.target: 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。

trans-unit.source: If the document is not protected, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果未受保护文档，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Copies all styles from the attached template into the document, overwriting any existing styles in the document that have the same name.
trans-unit.target: 将所附加模板中的所有样式复制到文档中，并覆盖文档中现有的同名样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the styles in the document are updated to match the styles in the attached template each time the document is opened.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否更新文档样式，以便在每次打开文档时都与所附加的模板中的样式相匹配。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the styles in the document are updated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对文档样式进行更新，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Updates the keyword and comment text in the **Properties** dialog box to reflect the AutoSummary content for the document.
trans-unit.target: 更新“属性”对话框中的关键字和注释文本，以反映文档的自动摘要内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use the default math settings when creating new equations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在创建新公式时使用默认数学设置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the default math settings when creating new equations; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在创建新公式时使用默认数学设置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the document or application was created or opened by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示文档或应用程序是否该用户创建或打开。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document or application was created or opened by the user; <see langword="false" /> if the document or application was created or opened programmatically from another Microsoft Office application with the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Documents.Open(System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@)" /> method or the <c>VBA.Interaction.CreateObject</c> or <c>VBA.Interaction.GetObject</c> method.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果创建或由用户; 打开文档或应用程序<see langword="false" />如果文档或应用程序创建或从具有的其他 Microsoft Office 应用程序以编程方式打开<see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Documents.Open(System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@,System.Object@)" />方法或<c>VBA。Interaction.CreateObject</c>或<c>VBA。Interaction.GetObject</c>方法。

trans-unit.source: If Microsoft Office Word is visible to the user, or if you call the `UserControl` property of a Word <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document> object from within a Word code customization, this property will always return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Microsoft Office Word 可见给用户，或如果调用`UserControl`词的属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document>对象中的 Word 代码自定义项，此属性将始终返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Variables" /> collection that represents the variables stored in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Variables" /> 集合，该集合表示存储在文档中的变量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Variables" /> collection that represents the variables stored in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Variables" /> 集合，表示存储在文档中的变量。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) project for the document has been digitally signed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示文档的 Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) 项目是否已经过数字签名。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) project for the document has been digitally signed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档的 Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) 项目已经过数字签名，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.VBProject</c> for the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取文档的 <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.VBProject</c>。

trans-unit.source: The <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.VBProject</c> for the document.
trans-unit.target: <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.VBProject</c>文档。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to gain access to code modules and user forms.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性来访问代码模块和用户窗体。

trans-unit.source: Displays the code window for the selected ActiveX control in the document.
trans-unit.target: 显示文档中选定 ActiveX 控件的代码窗口。

trans-unit.source: This method is available only from outside of Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是仅可从 Microsoft Office Word 之外。

trans-unit.source: Displays the property window for the selected ActiveX control in the specified document.
trans-unit.target: 显示指定文档中选定 ActiveX 控件的属性窗口。

trans-unit.source: This method is available only from outside of Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是仅可从 Microsoft Office Word 之外。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.SmartTagCollection" /> associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取与文档关联的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.SmartTagCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.SmartTagCollection" /> associated with the document.
trans-unit.target: 与文档关联的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.SmartTagCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions" /> object, which contains document-level attributes used by Microsoft Office Word when you save a document as a Web page or open a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions" /> 对象，该对象包含在您将文档另存为网页或者打开网页时，Microsoft Office Word 使用的文档级特性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions" /> object, which contains document-level attributes used by Microsoft Office Word when you save a document as a Web page or open a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WebOptions" /> 对象，该对象包含在您将文档另存为网页或者打开网页时，Microsoft Office Word 使用的文档级特性。

trans-unit.source: Displays a preview of the document as it would look if saved as a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 显示文档的预览效果，就像将它另存为网页那样。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Windows" /> collection that represents all windows for the document (for example, Sales.doc:1 and Sales.doc:2).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Windows" /> 集合，该集合表示文档的所有窗口（例如，Sales.doc:1 和 Sales.doc:2）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Windows" /> collection that represents all windows for the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Windows" /> 集合，表示文档的所有窗口。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the document window is resized or moved.
trans-unit.target: 在对文档窗口进行大小调整或移动时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建的处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.WindowSize>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays in the window caption the number of times that the window has been resized.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序的窗口标题中显示的已调整窗口大小时的次数。

trans-unit.source: This example is for an application-level add-in.
trans-unit.target: 此示例适用于应用程序级外接程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets an XML string that contains the contents of the document in the Word Open XML format.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 XML 字符串，该字符串包含文档中具有 Word Open XML 格式的内容。

trans-unit.source: An XML string that contains the contents of the document in the Word Open XML format.
trans-unit.target: 一个 XML 字符串，其中包含文档中具有 Word Open XML 格式的内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words" /> collection that represents all the words in the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中的所有单词。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words" /> collection that represents all the words in the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words" /> 集合，表示文档中的所有单词。

trans-unit.source: Punctuation and paragraph marks in a document are included in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 在文档中的标点和段落标记都将纳入<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Words?displayProperty=fullName>集合。

trans-unit.source: Sets a password for saving changes to the document.
trans-unit.target: 设置一个用来保存对文档所做更改的密码。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using hard-coded passwords in your applications.
trans-unit.target: 避免在你的应用程序中使用硬编码的密码。

trans-unit.source: If a password is required in a procedure, request the password from the user, store it in a variable, and then use the variable in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果在过程中需要使用密码，从用户请求密码、 将其存储在变量中，然后在代码中使用该变量。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the document is protected with a write password.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示文档是否用写密码保护。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document is protected with a write password; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档用写密码保护，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user adds a new XML element to a document.
trans-unit.target: 在用户向文档添加新的 XML 元素时发生。

trans-unit.source: If more than one element is added to the document at the same time (for example, when cutting and pasting XML), the event is raised for each element that is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时向文档添加多个元素（例如，在剪切和粘贴 XML 时），则会针对插入的每个元素引发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user deletes an XML element from a document.
trans-unit.target: 在用户从文档中删除 XML 元素时发生。

trans-unit.source: If more than one element is deleted from the document at the same time (for example, when cutting and pasting XML), the event is raised for each element that is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时从文档中删除多个元素（例如，在剪切和粘贴 XML 时），则会针对删除的每个元素引发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether to hide the XML namespaces in the list of elements in the **XML Structure** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示是否在“XML 结构”任务窗格中的元素列表中隐藏 XML 命名空间。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the XML schema namespace for elements is not shown to the right of the element name; <see langword="false" /> if the XML schema namespace is shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素的 XML 架构命名空间未显示在元素名的右侧，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果显示 XML 架构命名空间，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` might be helpful when multiple schemas that contain similar or identical element names are attached to the same document.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`false`时包含类似或相同的元素名称的多个架构附加到同一文档可能很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents the collection of all XML elements within the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中所有 XML 元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents the collection of all XML elements within the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，表示文档中所有 XML 元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Microsoft Office Word saves only the XML data or the entire document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示 Microsoft Office Word 是仅保存 XML 数据还是保存整个文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Word should save only the XML data when the document is saved as xml; <see langword="false" /> if the entire document should be saved.
trans-unit.target: 如果在将文档另存为 XML 时 Word 应当仅保存 XML 数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果应当保存整个文档，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path and file name for the Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) to apply when a user saves the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在用户保存文档时应用的可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: The path and file name for the Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) to apply when a user saves the document.
trans-unit.target: 要在用户保存文档时应用的可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A> property is only applicable when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A>属性才适用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A> property is set to `false`, Microsoft Office Word will ignore the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A>属性设置为`false`，Microsoft Office Word 将忽略<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLSchemaReferences" /> collection that represents the schemas attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLSchemaReferences" /> 集合，该集合表示附加到文档的架构。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLSchemaReferences" /> collection that represents the schemas attached to the document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLSchemaReferences" /> 集合，表示附加到文档的架构。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents all nodes in the document that have validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，该集合表示文档中有验证错误的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents all nodes in the document that have validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，表示文档中有验证错误的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether error message text is generated from the built-in Microsoft Office Word error messages or from the Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) 5.0 component included with Office.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示错误消息文本是从内置的 Microsoft Office Word 错误消息生成，还是从包含在 Office 中的 Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) 5.0 组件生成。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if error message text is generated from the MSXML 5.0 component; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果错误信息文本是从 MSXML 5.0 组件生成的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Using advanced error messages from the MSXML 5.0 component provides more specific error messages.
trans-unit.target: 使用从 MSXML 5.0 组件的高级的错误消息提供更具体的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: There are approximately 500 error messages provided through the XML Core Services that are accessible when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLShowAdvancedErrors%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 有大约 500 错误消息都可以访问 XML Core Services 通过提供<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLShowAdvancedErrors%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Word has approximately 50 built-in generic schema errors.
trans-unit.target: Word 有大约 50 个内置的常规架构错误。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLShowAdvancedErrors%2A> property is `false`, Word uses the built-in error messages for errors generated in XML documents.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLShowAdvancedErrors%2A>属性是`false`，Word 将内置的错误消息用于在 XML 文档中生成的错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to save a document through an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示是否通过可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 来保存文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the document is saved through an XSLT; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果文档是通过 XSLT 保存的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A> property to `true`, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A> property to specify the path and file name of the XSLT to use.
trans-unit.target: 设置时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLUseXSLTWhenSaving%2A>属性`true`，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Document.XMLSaveThroughXSLT%2A>属性来指定要使用的 XSLT 路径和文件名。
